anya-e0601n:573_1: mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ dīpaṅkarapādamūle
anya-e0601n:573_2: katābhinīhāro kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni anupubbena pāramiyo pūretvā
anya-e0601n:573_3: anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlanti. Agganti etena
anya-e0601n:573_5: sattānaṃ uttamabhāvaṃ dasseti. Anantañāṇantietena sammāsambodhiṃ dasseti. Sabbaññutañāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi
anya-e0601n:573_7: Tassa ca sāmatthiyena catupaṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ catuvesārajjañāṇaṃ chaasādhāraṇañāṇāni
anya-e0601n:573_8: ca chaabhiññā aṭṭhasu parisāsu akampana ñāṇāni dasabalañāṇāni soḷasañāṇacariyā ca
anya-e0601n:573_9: catucattārīsañāṇavatthūni sattasattatiñāṇavatthūni cāti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāpabhedānaṃ
anya-e0601n:573_10: vasena ñāṇācāraṃ dassetīti. Taṃ buddhaṃ ahaṃ vippasannena cetasā vandāmīti sambandhoti.
anya-e0601n:574_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Narānarasamosaraṇaṃ manussadevānaṃ samaṃ osaraṇaṃ sannipatitaṭṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0601n:574_2: karaṇabhūtena vihatandhakāraṃ hanitabba avijjāsaṅkhātamohatamaṃ, atthābhikāmaṃ sattalokassa
anya-e0601n:574_4: hitaṃ dhārakaṃ, kāruṇikaṃ sabbasattesu mahākaruṇāya yuttaṃ mahākaruṇavantaṃ vā, aggaṃ
anya-e0601n:574_5: jātipuññaguṇamahattabhāvena sabbasattuttamaṃ, ananta ñāṇaṃ gaṇavasena ca sabhāvavasena
anya-e0601n:574_6: ca visayavasena ca antavirahitañāṇaṃ, anantaṃ sabbaññutañāṇavantaṃ vā taṃ buddhaṃ
anya-e0601n:581_0: 16. Evaṃ pannarasamagāthāya buddhaṃ vanditvā idāni isipatana migadāye dhammacakkapavattanādiguṇehi
anya-e0601n:581_1: thomitvā munindaṃ vanditu kāmo akhilaguṇanidhāno tyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana nanamayayagaṇehi
anya-e0601n:581_2: racitattā pannarasakkharehi yuttā mālinī gāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye “nanamayayayutāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:581_3: mālinībhogisīhī”ti. Tassattho. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ bhogisīhi aṭṭhasattayatīhi yuttā
anya-e0601n:581_4: ca nanamayayayutā nanagaṇamagaṇa yayagaṇehi yuttā ca ce siyuṃ, ayaṃ gāthā mālinīgāthā
anya-e0601n:581_5: nāmāti. Ettha ca bhogisīhīti bhogaisīhīti padacchedo. Bhogasaddo aṭṭhasaṅkhyā vācako.
anya-e0601n:582_1: patiṭṭhāno. Ettha ca akhilasaddo anavasesavācako. Sabboti attho. Vuttañhi madhuṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:582_2: “khilasaddo hettha avasesavācako”ti. Na khilaṃ akhilaṃ. Atha vā na khīyatīti akhilaṃ,
anya-e0601n:582_3: sabbaṃ. Napubbakhidhātu khaye lo. Guṇasaddassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Akhilāni
anya-e0601n:582_4: sabbāni guṇāni akhilaguṇāni, tesaṃ nidhāti tiṭṭhati etthāti akhilaguṇanidhāno, munindo
anya-e0601n:582_5: labbhati. Yoti yo yādiso. Munindopagantvāti ettha munindo upagantvāti padacchedo.
anya-e0601n:582_6: Munindoti agāriyamuni, anagāriyamuni, sekkhamuni, asekkhamuni, pacceka munivasena
anya-e0601n:582_7: pañcannaṃ munīnaṃ indo issaroti attho. Tassa pana vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Akhilaguṇanidhāno
anya-e0601n:582_8: yo munindo saññatānaṃ niketaṃ isipatanaavhaṃ vanaṃ upagantvā tahiṃ akusalachedaṃ
anya-e0601n:583_0: Vanamisipatanavhanti vanaṃ isipatanaavhanti padacchedo. Ettha vananti migadāyavanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:583_1: Tañhi vivekakāmehi vanitabbaṃ sambhajitabbaṃ etthāti vananti vuccati. Vanadhātu sambhattiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:583_2: kvi. Isipatanavhanti isipatananāmikaṃ isīnaṃ patanaṭṭhānattā isipatananti voharitabbaṃ
anya-e0601n:583_3: vā, sīlakkhandhādike esanti gavesantīti isi, paccekabuddhādayo. Isadhātu gavesane
anya-e0601n:583_4: ipaccayo. Te patanti sannipatanti etthāti isipatanaṃ, vanaṃ. Isisaddūpapadapatadhātu
anya-e0601n:583_5: gatiyaṃ yu. Atha vā isīnaṃ patanaṃ isipatanaṃ, vanaṃ. Avhetabbaṃ voharitabbanti avhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:583_6: Āpubbavhedhātu avhayane kvi. Saṃyogaparattā ākārassa rassādeso. Isipatananti avhetabbanti
anya-e0601n:583_7: isipatanavhaṃ, vanaṃ. Saññatānanti kāyavacīmanosaṃyamantānaṃ sādhūnaṃ. Saṃyamantīti
anya-e0601n:583_8: saññatā, paccekabuddhādayo sādhū. Saṃpubbayamudhātu uparame ta. Tesaṃ saññatānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:583_9: Niketanti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ, rammaṇaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Nikitati nivasati rammati vā etthāti
anya-e0601n:583_10: niketaṃ, vanaṃ. Nipubba kitadhātu nivāse ṇa. Upagantvāti gamitvā. Tahinti tasmiṃ
anya-e0601n:583_11: isipatananāmake migadāyavane. Akusalachedanti akusalassa samucchedaṃ. Akusalaṃ chindati
anya-e0601n:583_12: samucchindati etena suttenāti akusalachedaṃ, dhammacakka pavattanasuttaṃ. Akusalasaddūpapadachididhātu dvidhākaraṇe ṇa.
anya-e0601n:584_0: Dhammacakkanti dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṃ. Ettha hi cakkasaddo sampattiyaṃ, lakkhaṇe,
anya-e0601n:584_1: rathaṅge, iriyāpathe, dāne, ratana dhammakhuracakkādīsu ca dissati. Cattārimāni bhikkhave
anya-e0601n:584_2: cakkāni, yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānantiādīsu hi sampattiyaṃ dissati. Pādatalesu
anya-e0601n:584_3: cakkāni jātānīti ettha lakkhaṇe. Cakkaṃva vahato padanti ettha rathaṅge. Catucakkaṃ
anya-e0601n:584_4: navadvāranti ettha iriyāpathe. Dadaṃ bhuñja mā ca pamādo cakkaṃ vattaya sabbapāṇīnanti
anya-e0601n:584_5: ettha dāne. Dibbacakkaratanaṃ pāturahosīti ettha ratanacakke. Mayā pavattitaṃ cakkanti
anya-e0601n:584_6: ettha dhammacakke. Icchāhatassa posassa cakkaṃ bhamati matthaketi ettha khuracakke.
anya-e0601n:584_7: Khurapariyantena cakkenāti ettha paharaṇacakke. Asanivicakkanti ettha asanimaṇḍale.
anya-e0601n:584_8: Idha panāyaṃ dhammacakke daṭṭhabbo. Tañhi satipaṭṭhānādidhammaṃ cakketi pavattetīti
anya-e0601n:584_9: dhammacakkanti vuccati. Ariyasaccādidhammaṃ vā cakketi pavattetīti cakkanti. Atha
anya-e0601n:584_10: vā dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ āṇācakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ. Dhammena ñāyena
anya-e0601n:584_11: cakkanti dhammacakkaṃ, tena vuttaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “dhammacakkanti kenaṭṭhena dhammacakkaṃ.
anya-e0601n:584_12: Dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, cakkañca pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṃ,
anya-e0601n:584_13: dhammena pavattetīti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammacariyāya pavattetīti dhammacakkaṃ, dhamme
anya-e0601n:584_14: ṭhito pavattetīti dhammacakka”ntiādi. Api ca dhammacakkanti paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampi.
anya-e0601n:584_15: Tattha paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena bodhipallaṅke nisinno cattāri saccāni soḷasahākārehi
anya-e0601n:584_16: saṭṭhinayasahassehi paṭivijjhi. Desanāñāṇaṃ nāma yena ñāṇena tiparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ
anya-e0601n:584_17: dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi. Ubhayampetaṃ dasabalassa ure jātañāṇameva. Tesu pana dhammadesanāñāṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:584_18: adhippetaṃ. Suttaṃ pana ṭhānūpacārena dhammacakkanti vuccati. Pavattoti pañcavaggiyānaṃ
anya-e0601n:584_19: bhikkhūnaṃ dveme bhikkhave antā pabbajitena na sevitabbātiādinā adesayi.
anya-e0601n:585_0: Tamatulamabhikantanti taṃ atulaṃ abhikantanti padacchedo. Ettha tanti munindaṃ. Atulanti
anya-e0601n:585_1: sīlādīhi guṇehi kenaci asadisaṃ. Natthi tulo sadiso puggalo etassāti atulo, munindo.
anya-e0601n:585_2: Tassa hi aparimāṇāsu loka dhātūsu sīlādīhi guṇehi sadiso puggalo natthi. Asadisehi
anya-e0601n:585_3: buddhehi samoti attho. Abhikantanti sabbadevamanussehi ativiya kantaṃ kamanīyaṃ sarīravaṇṇavantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:585_4: Atirekaṃ tusitabbasarīravaṇṇasampannaṃ vā. Abhikkantavaṇṇanti hi vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
anya-e0601n:585_5: kakāralopañca vaṇṇapadalopaṃ katvā vuttasandhivasena abhikantanti vuttaṃ. Uttarapadalopa
anya-e0601n:585_6: vasena vā. Munindassa pana sarīravaṇṇaṃ sabbadevamanussehi ativiya atirekaṃ vā kamiyati
anya-e0601n:585_7: tosiyatīti abhikantanti vuccati. Abhipubbakamudhātu icchākantīsu ta. Abhikantaṃ vaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:585_8: sarīravaṇṇaṃ yassa soti abhikanto, munindo. Tassa hi dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi
anya-e0601n:585_9: ca asītyānubyañjana lakkhaṇehi ca chabbaṇṇaraṃsīhi ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇena ca samannā gatattā
anya-e0601n:585_10: sarīrasobhaggappattito sabbadevamanussehi ativiya kamanīyo tuṭṭho sarīravaṇṇo atthīti
anya-e0601n:585_11: abhikantanti thometi. Taṃ abhikantaṃ. Vandaneyyanti devamanussānaṃ vandanārahaṃ.
anya-e0601n:585_12: Tehi vanditabbaṃ vā, vandiyate thomiyate vā vandanaṃ. Bhāvasādhanoyaṃ. Vandadhātu
anya-e0601n:585_13: vadidhātu vā abhivādanathutīsu yu. Taṃ arahatīti vandaneyyo, munindo. Vandapadaṃ
anya-e0601n:586_0: Atha vā devamanussehi vanditabbaṃ thomitabbanti vā vandaneyyo, munindo. So hi ādimajjhapariyosāna
anya-e0601n:586_1: guṇehi samannāgatattā sabbadevamanussānaṃ vandanāraho tehi vā vanditabbo hoti. Tattha
anya-e0601n:586_2: ca ādiguṇaṃ nāma karuṇānidānaṃ sīlaṃ pāṇātipātādiviratippavattito. Majjha guṇaṃ nāma
anya-e0601n:586_3: samādhi jhānattayayogato. Pariyosānaguṇaṃ nāma paññā tato uttari karaṇīyābhāvatoti
anya-e0601n:586_4: visesena bhagavato vandaneyyanti thometi. Ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi namāmi vandāmīti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:587_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Akhilanidhāno sabba lokiyalokuttarasaṅkhātānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇa
anya-e0601n:587_1: samūhānaṃ patiṭṭhāno yo yādiso munindo pañcannaṃ munīnaṃ indo issaro bhagavā, saññatānaṃ
anya-e0601n:587_2: kāyavacīmanosaṃya mantānaṃ sādhūnaṃ, niketaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ rammaṇaṭṭhānaṃ vā, isipatanavhaṃ
anya-e0601n:587_3: isipatananāmikaṃ isipatananti voharitabbaṃ vā, vanaṃ migadāyavanaṃ, upagantvā gamitvā
anya-e0601n:587_4: tahiṃ tasmiṃ isipatananāmake migadāya vane, akusalassa samucchedaṃ, dhammacakkaṃ
anya-e0601n:587_5: dhammacakkappavattanasuttaṃ, pavatto pañcavaggiyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ adesayi, atulaṃ sīlādīhi
anya-e0601n:587_6: guṇehi kenaci asadisaṃ, abhikantaṃ sabbadevamanussehi ativiya kantaṃ kamanīyaṃ tuṭṭhi
anya-e0601n:587_7: sarīravaṇṇavantaṃ, vandaneyyaṃ deva manussānaṃ vandanārahaṃ tehi vā vanditabbaṃ,
anya-e0601n:587_8: taṃ munindaṃ ahaṃ tīhi dvārehi namāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:594_0: 17. Evaṃ soḷasamagāthāya munindaṃ vanditvā idāni suciparivāritantyādīhi sattahi guṇehi
anya-e0601n:594_1: thomitvā vanditukāmo suciparivāritantyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana na jabhajaragaṇehi
anya-e0601n:594_2: ca ekagarunā ca racitattā soḷasakkharehi yuttāvāṇinīgāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye
anya-e0601n:594_3: “najabhajarā yadā bhavati vāṇinī gayuttā”ti. Tassattho. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ najabhajarā
anya-e0601n:594_4: nagaṇa jagaṇa bhagaṇa jagaṇa ragaṇā yadā gayuttā pādantagarunā saṃyogā ce siyuṃ,
anya-e0601n:594_5: tadā sā vuttā vāṇinī vāṇinīgāthā nāma bhavatīti.
anya-e0601n:595_1: kilesamalavisuddhaṃ parikkhāravantaṃ vā. Rāgādimalehi sucati sujjhatīti suci, parisā.
anya-e0601n:595_2: Sucadhātu soceyye i. Parisamantato ariyabhikkhuādīhi deva manussehi vāriyati parikkhariyatīti
anya-e0601n:595_3: parivāro, sugato. Paripubbavaradhātu āvaraṇe parikkhāre vā ṇa. Sucīhi parisāhi parivārito
anya-e0601n:595_4: suciparivārito, sugato. Tatiya tappurisasamāsoyaṃ. Bhagavato hi sadā rāgādimala visuddhehi
anya-e0601n:595_5: ariyabhikkhuādīhi catūhi parisāhi aṭṭhahi parisāhi vā parivārito hotīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0601n:595_6: Atha vā suciparisuddhaṃ parivāritaṃ yassa soti suciparivārito, sugato. Surucirappabhāhīti
anya-e0601n:595_7: suṭṭhu kantitasarīranikkhanta byāmamattaraṃsīhi karaṇabhūtehi suṭṭhu ruciyati kamiyati
anya-e0601n:595_8: tusiyatīti surucirā, raṃsi. Supubba rucadhātu rocane iro. Pakārena bhāti dibbatīti
anya-e0601n:595_9: pabhā, raṃsi. Papubba bhādhātu dibbane kvi. Surucirā ca sā pabhā cāti surucirappabhā,
anya-e0601n:595_10: tāhi surucirappabhāhi. Rattanti niccaṃ rañjitabbakāyaṃ. Rañjiyatīti ratto, kāyo.
anya-e0601n:595_11: Ranjadhātu rāge ta. Ratto kāyo yassa soti ratto, sugato. Uttarapadalopasamā soyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:595_12: Rūpassa bhavo rūpaṃ viya, taṃ rattaṃ. Bhagavato hi sarīrato niccaṃ nikkhantehi byāmamattaraṃsīhi
anya-e0601n:596_0: Sirivisarālayanti paññāpuññasaṅkhātalakkhisamūhānaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ. Ettha ca sirīti
anya-e0601n:596_1: paññāpuññānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Atha vā puññanibbattā sarīrasobhaggādisampatti. Sā
anya-e0601n:596_2: hi katapuññe siyati nissayati, katapuññehi vā siyati nissiyatīti sirīti vuccati,
anya-e0601n:596_3: paññāpuññaṃ, issariyaṃ vā. Sarīrasobhaggādi sampatti vā labbhati. Vuttañhi vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathādīsu
anya-e0601n:596_4: “sirīti buddhipuññānaṃ adhivacananti ca. Sirīti issariyanti ca sirīti rūpakāyasampattī”ti
anya-e0601n:596_5: ca. Sidhātu sevāyaṃ, rapaccayo ca, itthiliṅgajotakaīpaccayo ca. Sirīti hi dīghavasena
anya-e0601n:596_6: vattabbe gāthābandhattā chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ rassavasena vuttaṃ. Visarālayanti visaraālayanti
anya-e0601n:596_7: padacchedo. Visaroti samūho. Visanti pavisanti avayavā yasmiṃ samūheti visaro, samūho.
anya-e0601n:596_8: Visadhātu pavesane arapaccayo. Atha vā visaranti samosaranti avayavā yasminti visaro.
anya-e0601n:596_9: Vipubba saradhātu samosaraṇe a. Potthakesu pana visayāla yanti yakārena pāṭho dissati.
anya-e0601n:596_10: Na so yujjati. Kasmā, visarasaddasseva samūhavācakattā. Vuttañhi abhidhānappa dīpikāyaṃ –
anya-e0601n:601_0: Ālayanti patiṭṭhānaṃ. Ālayanti patiṭṭhanti etthāti ālayo, sugato. Āpubba lidhātu
anya-e0601n:601_1: alliyane ṇa. Sirīnaṃ paññāsaṅkhātalakkhīnaṃ visaro samūho sirīvisaro, tesaṃ ālayo
anya-e0601n:601_2: sirīvisarālayo, sugato. Taṃ sirivisarālayaṃ. Gupitamindriyehupetanti gopitabbehi
anya-e0601n:601_3: saṃvaritabbehi cakkhādīhi chahi indriyehi upetaṃ samupetaṃ samannāgataṃ. Gupiyanti
anya-e0601n:601_4: rakkhiyantīti gupitāni. Gupadhātu rakkhane ta. Idanti sahajātadhamme issariyaṃ karontīti
anya-e0601n:601_5: indriyāni. Ididhātu paramissariye iyo. Gupitāni indriyāni gupitamindriyāni, cakkhādiindriyāni
anya-e0601n:601_6: labbhanti. Tehi. Upeti sampajjatīti upeto, sugato. Upapubba idhātu gatiyaṃ ta, taṃ
anya-e0601n:601_7: upetaṃ. Kiñcāpi buddhato aññehi ariyasāvakādīhi puggalehi cakkhādiindriyāni rakkhitāni.
anya-e0601n:601_8: Buddhoyeva pana bodhipallaṅke saha vāsanāya sabba kilesānaṃ arahattamaggena viddhaṃsitattā
anya-e0601n:601_9: visiṭṭhena cakkhādi indriyaṃ rakkhito hotīti tassa gupitamindriyehupetanti thometi.
anya-e0601n:602_1: abhivicitrapādaṃ. Upasaddo cettha bhusaṭṭhavācako. Abhivicitraṃ sūriyamaṇḍala candamaṇḍalādiṃ
anya-e0601n:602_2: pādacakkalakkhaṇavantaṃ vā. Ettha ca ravīti sūriyo, so hi ravati sīghaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0601n:602_3: ravīti vuccati. Rudhātu gatiyaṃ ṇi. Vuttañhi pātheyyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “cando ujukaṃ saṇikaṃ
anya-e0601n:602_4: gacchati, sūriyassa pana ujukaṃ gamanaṃ sīgha”nti. Ṇvādi moggallāne pana “rusadde
anya-e0601n:602_5: i. O avādeso. Ravati gajjatīti ravi. Ādicco”ti vuttaṃ. Abhidhāna ṭīkāyañca “ravanti
anya-e0601n:602_6: etena sattā pabhāvitattāti ravī”ti vuttaṃ. Sasīti cando. So hi sasati tiṇena pāṇati
anya-e0601n:602_7: jīvatīti saso, sasapaṇḍito. Sasadhātu pāṇe a. Sasarūpalakkhaṇamettha atthīti sasīti
anya-e0601n:602_8: vuccati. Atīte hi sasarājā brāhmaṇavesena āgantvā yācakassa sakkarañño aṅgārarāsimhi
anya-e0601n:602_9: laṅghitvā jīvitaṃ pariccajitvā kāyaṃ adāsi. Atha pana sakko rājā tassa sasapaṇḍitassa
anya-e0601n:602_10: jīvitapariccajitassa jīvitadānaguṇo sakalakappaṃ pākaṭo hotūti pabbataṃ pīḷetvā pabbatarasaṃ
anya-e0601n:602_11: ādāya candamaṇḍale sasarūpalakkhaṇaṃ likhitvā ṭhapesi. Tasmā cando sasīti lokehi
anya-e0601n:602_12: vohariyati. Tassa pana vitthāro sasapaṇḍitajātake passitvā gahetabbo.
anya-e0601n:603_0: Atha vā sasati hiṃsati uṇhaguṇanti sasīti vuccati. Sasudhātu hiṃsāyaṃ īpaccayo. Maṇḍiyati
anya-e0601n:603_1: vibhūsiyati paricchedakaraṇavasenāti maṇḍalaṃ. Maṇḍadhātu maḍidhātu vā vibhūsane
anya-e0601n:603_2: alo. Atha vā maṇḍaṃ vibhūsanaṃ parisamantato lāti gaṇhātīti maṇḍalaṃ. Maṇḍasaddūpapada
anya-e0601n:603_3: lādhātu gahaṇe kvi. Ravino maṇḍalaṃ ravimaṇḍalaṃ, sasino maṇḍalaṃ sasimaṇḍalaṃ, ravimaṇḍalañca
anya-e0601n:603_4: sasimaṇḍalañca ravisasimaṇḍalaṃ, maṇḍalasaddo ravisaddepi yojetabbo. Maṇḍalasaddassa
anya-e0601n:603_5: dvandapadato suyyamānattā. Pabhutītiādi. So hi ādyatthavācako abyayanipāto. Ravisasimaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0601n:603_6: pabhutiādi yassāti ravisasimaṇḍalappabhuti, pādacakkalakkhaṇaṃ labbhati. Lakkhiyati
anya-e0601n:603_7: lakkhitabbaṃ etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ, pādappa vattacakkalakkhaṇaṃ, ravisasimaṇḍalappabhuti
anya-e0601n:603_8: ca taṃ lakkhaṇañcāti ravisasimaṇḍalappabhutilakkhaṇaṃ, tena upacittaṃ ativicitraṃ
anya-e0601n:603_9: pādaṃ yassa soti ravisasimaṇḍalappabhutilakkhaṇopa citto, sugato. Atha vā upacittaṃ
anya-e0601n:603_10: ativicitraṃ ravisasi maṇḍalappabhutilakkhaṇaṃ pādacakkalakkhaṇaṃ assāti tathā, sugato. Taṃ.
anya-e0601n:604_0: Suranarapūjitanti devamanussehi pūjitabbaṃ. Suranti issariya kīḷādīhi dibbantīti
anya-e0601n:604_1: surā, devā. Suradhātu dibbane a. Atha vā surati isati devissariyaṃ pāpuṇāti virocati
anya-e0601n:604_2: cāti surā, devā. Suradhātu issariyadittīsu a. Sundarā rāvācā etesanti vā surā, devā.
anya-e0601n:604_3: Khandhasantānaṃ sakakammaṃ vā naranti niyantīti narā, manussā. Naradhātu nayane a.
anya-e0601n:604_4: Surā ca narā ca suranarā, tehi pūjitabboti suranara pūjito, sugato. Taṃ. Sugatanti
anya-e0601n:604_5: buddhaṃ. So hi sobhanaṃ gataṃ gamanaṃ etassāti sugatoti vuccati. Bhagavato hi veneyyajanūpasaṅkamanaṃ
anya-e0601n:604_6: ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ. Tathā lakkhaṇānubyañjanappaṭi maṇḍitarūpakāyatāya
anya-e0601n:604_8: rājahaṃsausabha vāraṇa migarājagamanaṃ kāyagamanaṃ. Ñāṇagamanañca vipula nimmala
anya-e0601n:604_9: karuṇā sati vīriyādi guṇavisesa sahita abhinīhārato yāva mahābodhi anavajjatāya sobhanamevāti.
anya-e0601n:605_0: Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhi samayavasena parijānanto ñāṇena
anya-e0601n:605_1: sammā gato avagatoti sugato, tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānātisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ
anya-e0601n:605_2: āpādento sammā gato avagatoti sugato, lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena
anya-e0601n:605_3: sammā gato avagatoti sugato, lokanirodhagāminippaṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhi samayavasena
anya-e0601n:605_4: sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato, sotāpattimaggena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese na puneti
anya-e0601n:605_5: na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugatotiādinā nayena ayamattho vibhāvetabbo. Atha vā
anya-e0601n:605_6: sundaraṃ ṭhānaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ nibbānameva vā gato adhigatoti sugato. Yasmā vā bhūtaṃ
anya-e0601n:605_7: tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ yuttameva ca dhammaṃ bhāsati, tasmā sammā
anya-e0601n:605_8: gadatīti sugato dakārassa takāraṃ katvā. Iti sobhana gamanatādīhi sugato, taṃ sugataṃ.
anya-e0601n:605_9: Ādaranti sakkaccaṃ, ādaranaṃ ādaro. Āpubba daradhātu ādare ṇa. Taṃ ādaraṃ. Namāmīti
anya-e0601n:606_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Suciparivāritaṃ rāgādimala visuddhāhi ariyasāvakādiparisāhi
anya-e0601n:606_1: parikkhāritaṃ kilesamalavisuddhaṃ parikkhāravantaṃ vā, surucirappabhāhi suṭṭhu kantita
anya-e0601n:606_2: sarīranikkhantabyāmamattaraṃsīhi karaṇabhūtehi, rattaṃ niccaṃ rañjitabbakāyaṃ, sirivisarālayaṃ
anya-e0601n:606_3: paññāpuññasaṅkhātalakkhisa mūhānaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ, gupitamindriyehi gupitabbehi saṃvaritabbehi
anya-e0601n:606_4: chahi cakkhādiindriyehi, upetaṃ samupetaṃ samannāgataṃ, ravisasimaṇḍalappabhutilakkhaṇopacittaṃ
anya-e0601n:606_6: sūriya maṇḍalacandamaṇḍalādiṃ pādacakkalakkhaṇavantaṃ vā, suranarapūjitaṃ devamanussehi
anya-e0601n:606_7: pūjitabbaṃ, sugataṃ buddhaṃ ādaraṃ sakkaccaṃ ahaṃ namāmi vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:613_0: 18. Evaṃ sattarasamagāthāya sugataṃ vanditvā idāni saṃsāroghaṃ taritādīhi navahi
anya-e0601n:613_1: guṇehi thomitvā vanditukāmo maggoḷumpenatyādigāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana ma bha na ta ta
anya-e0601n:613_2: gaṇehi ca garudvayena ca racitattā sattarasakkharehi yuttā mandakkantāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:613_3: Vuttañhi vuttodaye “mandakkantā ma bha na tata gā go yugutvassa kehī”ti. Tassā panāyamattho.
anya-e0601n:613_4: Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ yugutvassakehi catu cha sattayatīhi ma bha na ta ta gā magaṇa bhagaṇa
anya-e0601n:613_5: nagaṇa tagaṇa tagaṇa garū ca go garu ca ce yuttā, mandakkantāgāthānāmāti. Yugutvassakehīti
anya-e0601n:613_6: ettha ca yugasaddassa maggaphalacatubbidhapurisayugaḷavācakattā yugasaddo catusaṅkhyāvācako,
anya-e0601n:613_7: utūnaṃ hemantasisira vassanta gimha vassāna sarada utuvasena chabbidhattā utusaddo
anya-e0601n:613_8: chasaṅkhyāvācako. Assasaddo sattasaṅkhyāvācakoti veditabbo. Chappaccayaṭīkādīsu hi
anya-e0601n:614_0: Tattha pana yo dhammarājā muhapaṭighāsādiullolavīciṃ saṃsāroghaṃ maggoḷumpena tari,
anya-e0601n:614_1: abhayaṃ pārapattaṃ pajānaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ asamasaraṇaṃ ekatitthaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ puññakkhettaṃ
anya-e0601n:614_2: paramasukhadaṃ taṃ dhammarājaṃ ahaṃ namāmīti sambandho. Etissaṃ pana atthakkamena
anya-e0601n:614_4: khuddaūmikaṃ. Muyhanti etena sampayuttadhammā, sayaṃ vā muyhati, muyhanamattamevetanti
anya-e0601n:614_5: muho, moho. Muhadhātu vekhitte ṇa. Paṭihaññanti sampayuttadhammā, sayaṃ vā paṭihaññati
anya-e0601n:614_6: paṭihaññanamattamevetanti paṭigho, doso. Paṭipubba hanadhātu hiṃsāgatīsu a. Hanassa
anya-e0601n:614_7: gho. Asanaṃ icchanaṃ āsā, isati icchatīti vā āsā, taṇhā. Isudhātu icchāyaṃ a. Issa
anya-e0601n:614_8: ā. Muho ca paṭigho ca āsā ca muhapaṭighāsā, te ādi yesanteti muhapaṭighāsādi, lobhādikilesā
anya-e0601n:614_9: labbhanti. Ettha ca ādisaddena māna diṭṭhi vicikicchā thina uddhacca ahirika anottappakilese
anya-e0601n:614_10: ca akusalacittuppāde ca saṅgaṇhāti. Uddhaṃ udakaṃ lolati ākuletīti ullolo, mahātaraṅgo.
anya-e0601n:614_11: Upubbalola dhātu ummādane ṇa. Tīraṃ ulati gacchatīti vā ullolo. Uladhātu gatiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:614_12: olapaccayo. Vimhayaṃ vicittaṃ cinotīti vīci, khuddakaūmi. Vipubba cidhātu caye kvi.
anya-e0601n:614_13: Ullolo ca vīci ca ullolavīci. Kesuci potthakesu ca kullolavīcintipāṭho dissati. Na
anya-e0601n:614_14: so yujjati, kasmā, kullasaddassa uḷumpatthavācakattā. Ullolasaddoyeva hi mahātaraṅgattha
anya-e0601n:614_15: vācako hotīti. Vuttañhi abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ “ullolo tu ca kallolo, mahāvīcisu kathyate”ti.
anya-e0601n:615_0: Mūlapaṇṇāsaṭṭhakathāyañca “kullo nāma taraṇatthāya kalāpaṃ katvā bandho. Pattharitvā
anya-e0601n:615_1: baddhā pana padaracāṭi ādayo uḷumpo”ti vutto. Muhapaṭighāsādieva ullolavīci. Sā asmiṃ
anya-e0601n:615_2: saṃsāroghe atthīti muhapaṭighāsādiullolavīci. Samāsantataddhitāyaṃ. Pītisukhaṃ, mahāsannaṃ,
anya-e0601n:615_3: rattidivantyādīsu viya. Evaṃ panettha vacanattho kātabbo. Pīti ca sukhañca pītisukhaṃ,
anya-e0601n:615_4: taṃ assa jhānassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti pītisukhaṃ, jhānaṃ. Mahantaṃ āsanaṃ
anya-e0601n:615_5: mahāsanaṃ, tassa bhāvo mahāsannaṃ. Ratti ca divā ca rattidivaṃ. Rattidivaṃ kataṃ
anya-e0601n:615_6: rattidivanti. Atha vā ullolavīci viya muhapaṭighāsādi ullolavīci, saṃsāroghaṃ labbhati.
anya-e0601n:615_7: Upamā bahubbīhisamāsoyaṃ. Yathā pana mahāsamudde bhāyitabbā mahātaraṅgaūmivegādayo
anya-e0601n:615_8: ca saṃsumāra timi tipiṅgalādi macchamakārādayo ca okiṇṇā honti, evaṃ mohādikilesā
anya-e0601n:615_9: ca akusalacittuppādā ca tehi nibbattā bhayānakā bahū jātijarābyādhimaraṇadukkhādayo
anya-e0601n:615_10: ca khandhādayo ca okiṇṇā hontīti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṃsāroghanti saṃsārasaṅkhātaṃ oghaṃ
anya-e0601n:615_11: samuddajalappavāhaṃ. Saṃpunappunaṃ abbocchinnaṃ vā sarati gacchati pavattatīti saṃsāro.
anya-e0601n:615_12: Saṃpubbasaradhātu gatiyaṃ ṇa. Khandhadhātuāyata nānaṃ abbocchinnaṃ pavattatīti attho.
anya-e0601n:618_0: Satte ottharitvā ajjhottharitvā heṭṭhā hanati haratīti ogho, jalappavāho. Avapubba
anya-e0601n:618_1: hanadhātu haraṇe ṇa. Hanassa gho. Avasaddo ottharaṇattho. Attani patite satte heṭṭhā
anya-e0601n:618_2: katvā haneti osīdāpetīti vā ogho, jalappavāho. Avapubba hanadhātu osīdāpane ṇa. Avasaddo
anya-e0601n:618_3: heṭṭhābhāgattho. Ogho viyāti ogho, saṃsāro. Atha vā sattasaṅkhāre ottharitvā ajjhottharitvā
anya-e0601n:618_4: abhibhavitvā vaṭṭasmiṃ hanati haratīti ogho, ohaneti osīdāpeti vaṭṭasmiṃ sattasaṅkhāreti
anya-e0601n:618_5: vā ogho, rāgādi kilesā labbhanti. Saṃsāroeva ogho saṃsārogho, taṃ saṃsāroghaṃ.
anya-e0601n:619_0: Maggoḷumpenāti ettha maggaoḷumpenāti padacchedo. Aṭṭhamaggaṅgasaṅkhātena kullenāti
anya-e0601n:619_1: attho. Ettha ca maggo vuccati aṭṭhaṅgikamaggo. Magganti gacchanti buddhā ca ariyasāvakā
anya-e0601n:619_2: ca agataṃ disaṃ nibbānanti maggo. Aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Maggadhātu gatiyaṃ a. Vuttañhi
anya-e0601n:619_3: paṭisambhidāmagge “etena maggena buddhā ca sāvakā ca agataṃ disaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchantīti
anya-e0601n:619_4: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti. Atha vā nibbānaṃ maggati gavesatīti maggo, nibbānatthikehi maggiyati
anya-e0601n:619_5: gavesiyatīti vā maggo, aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. Ñāṇena dassiyatīti attho. Maggadhātu gavesane
anya-e0601n:619_6: a. Vuttañhetaṃ mahāvaggasaṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “maggoti kenaṭṭhena maggo, nibbānaṃ
anya-e0601n:619_7: magganaṭṭhena nibbānatthikehi magganiyaṭṭhena cā”ti. Atha vā maggiyati paṭipajjiyatīti
anya-e0601n:619_8: maggo, nibbānatthikehi aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo paṭipajjiyatīti attho. Uḷu vuccati udakaṃ,
anya-e0601n:619_9: tato pāti rakkhatīti uḷupo, soyeva niggahitāgamavasena uḷumpo, kullo. Uḷusaddūpapadapādhātu
anya-e0601n:619_10: rakkhane kvi. Maggoeva uḷumpo maggoḷumpo, maggasaṅkhāto vā uḷumpo tathā, maggasadiso
anya-e0601n:619_11: vā uḷumpo tathā, maggo viya vā uḷumpo tathā, maggo ca uḷumpo ca maggoḷumpo. Atha
anya-e0601n:619_12: vā uḷumpoeva maggo maggoḷumpo, uḷumpasaṅkhāto vā maggo tathā, uḷumpa sadiso vā maggo
anya-e0601n:619_13: tathā, uḷumpo viya vā maggo tathā, uḷumpo ca maggo ca maggoḷumpoti evaṃ rūpakasadisaupamā
anya-e0601n:619_14: samupekkhatthavasena ca parapakkha sakapakkhatthavasena ca vacanattho veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:619_15: Tena maggoḷumpena. Tarīti atari. Dhammarājā hi aṭṭhamaggaṅganāvāya saṃsāroghaṃ taritvā
anya-e0601n:619_16: nibbānatīraṃ pāpuṇāti. Atītā buddhā pāpuṇiṃsu. Anāgatā buddhā pāpuṇissantīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0601n:626_0: Abhayanti jātijarābyādhimaraṇabhayādīnaṃ abhāvato nibbhayaṃ. So hi bhagavā natthi
anya-e0601n:626_1: bhayaṃ etassāti abhayoti vuccati. Atha vā abhayanti khemaṃ. Tañhi nibbānaṃ natthi
anya-e0601n:626_2: jātiādibhayaṃ etthāti abhayanti vuccati. Etasmiṃ pana dutiyavikappe taṃ padaṃ pārantipade
anya-e0601n:626_3: visesanaṃ. Pārapattanti ettha pāranti saṃsāravaṭṭassa paratīraṭṭhena vuccati nibbānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:626_4: Tañhi udakaṃ pāti rakkhatīti pāraṃ, samuddapāraṃ. Pādhātu rakkhane aro. Atha vā pāreti
anya-e0601n:626_5: samattheti taraṅgādayo vāretunti pāraṃ. Pāradhātu samatthiyaṃ a. Pāraṃ viyāti pāranti
anya-e0601n:626_6: vuccati. Nītatthena pana evaṃ vacanattho kātabbo. Jāti bhayādiṃ pāti rakkhati etthāti
anya-e0601n:626_7: pāraṃ, pāreti samattheti ettha vā jātibhayādayo vāretunti pāraṃ, nibbānaṃ. Taṃ pajjittha
anya-e0601n:626_8: adhigamitthāti pārapatto, dhammarājā. Pārasaddūpapada padadhātu gatiyaṃ ta. Atha
anya-e0601n:626_9: vā mutto moceyyantiādinā nayena pavattassa mahābhinīhārassa sakalassa saṃsāradukkhassa
anya-e0601n:626_10: vā sabbaññutañāṇādiguṇānaṃ vā pāraṃ pariyantaṃ patto gatoti pārapatto, dhammarājā.
anya-e0601n:626_11: Pārasaddo hi pariyanta vācako. Taṃ pārapattaṃ. Pajānanti sabbasattānaṃ. Tehi kammakilesehi
anya-e0601n:626_12: pakārena janiyati nibbattiyatīti pajāti vuccanti. Tesaṃ pajānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:627_0: Tāṇanti tāyanaṭṭhena tāṇaṃ. Sattānaṃ saṃsāra bhayato tāyati rakkhatīti tāṇo, dhammarājā.
anya-e0601n:627_1: Tādhātu rakkhane yu. Atha vā tāṇanti sattānaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhato paripālanaṭṭhena
anya-e0601n:627_2: tāṇaṃ. So hi dhammarājā sattānaṃ saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhato dhammadesanāya magga phalanibbānasukhaṃ
anya-e0601n:627_3: dadanto tāyati pāletīti tāṇoti vuccati. Taṃ tāṇaṃ. Leṇanti nilīyanaṭṭhena leṇaṃ,
anya-e0601n:627_4: jātibhayādīhi pīḷitehi sattehi līyanti nilīyanti etthāti leṇo, dhammarājā. Līdhātu
anya-e0601n:627_5: nilīyane yu. Atha vā leṇanti saṃsārabhayaṃ passantehi nilīyanaṭṭhena leṇaṃ. So hi
anya-e0601n:627_6: dhammarājā saṃsāranissaraṇatthikehi līyanti nilīyanti etthāti leṇoti vuccati. Taṃ
anya-e0601n:627_7: leṇaṃ. Dhammarājā hi saṃsārabhayehi pīḷitānaṃ sabbasattānaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ parāyanaṃ
anya-e0601n:628_0: Asamasaraṇanti sabbasattānaṃ asadisaavassayanaṃ, natthi etassa samo sadiso sīlādiguṇenāti
anya-e0601n:628_1: asamo, dhammarājā. Sarati gacchati avassayati etthāti saraṇo, dhammarājā. Saradhātu
anya-e0601n:628_2: gatimhi yu. Asamo asadiso hutvā saraṇoti asamasaraṇo, dhammarājā. Sambhāva nākammadhārayasamāsoyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:628_3: Dhammarājā hi sabbasampattisukhānaṃ dāyakattā sabbasattānaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ asamaṃ
anya-e0601n:628_4: saraṇaṃ avassayanaṃ parāyanaṃ hotīti attho. Taṃ asamasaraṇaṃ. Ekatitthanti nibbānapāragamanānaṃ
anya-e0601n:628_5: ekatitthabhūtaṃ. Taranti uttaranti ettha etena vā najjasamuddādinti titthaṃ. Najjasamuddādīnaṃ
anya-e0601n:628_6: pārimatīragamanatthaṃ otaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ labbhati. Taradhātu otaraṇe tha. Rassa to, ikārāgamo.
anya-e0601n:628_7: Manussānaṃ ekaṃ titthaṃ ekatitthaṃ, taṃ viyāti ekatittho, dhammarājā. Yathā hi titthena
anya-e0601n:628_8: najjādiṃ tarantā manussā pārimatīraṃ sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti, na atitthena, evaṃ seṭṭhabhūtena
anya-e0601n:628_9: buddhatitthena saṃsāroghaṃ tarantā veneyyasattā nibbānapāraṃ sukhaṃ pāpuṇanti, na
anya-e0601n:628_10: atitthena aññatitthiyena, tasmā dhammarājaṃ ekatitthoti thometi. Nītatthena pana
anya-e0601n:628_11: eko seṭṭho hutvā nibbānapāraṃ taranti uttaranti etthāti eka tittho, dhammarājā. Khemaṃ
anya-e0601n:628_12: nibbānapāraṃ taritukāmā veneyyasattā ettha buddhatitthe desitadhammaṃ sutvā desitadhammānurūpaṃ
anya-e0601n:628_13: paṭipajjitvā saṃsāroghaṃ aṭṭhamaggaṅganāvāya chinditvā khemaṃ nibbānapāraṃ sukhaṃ
anya-e0601n:628_14: taranti, ititasmā etthātipadena niddiṭṭho so buddho sabbasattānaṃ eko seṭṭho tittho
anya-e0601n:628_15: nāma. Na aññatitthiyā ekatitthā nāma hontīti attho. Taṃ ekatitthaṃ.
anya-e0601n:629_0: Patiṭṭhanti sabbasattānaṃ mahādīpaṃ viya patiṭṭhaṃ ādhārabhūtaṃ. Paṭisaraṇaṃ leṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:629_1: parāyananti attho. Patiṭṭhahanti etthāti patiṭṭho, dhammarājā. Patipubbaṭṭhādhātu
anya-e0601n:629_2: gatinivattimhi a. Dhammarājā hi sabbasukhatthikānaṃ sattānaṃ mahādīpo viya patiṭṭho
anya-e0601n:629_3: paṭisaraṇo leṇo parāyano hotīti attho, taṃ patiṭṭhaṃ. Puññakkhettanti nibbānasukhatthikānaṃ
anya-e0601n:629_4: puññabījassa khettabhūtaṃ. Puññatthikānaṃ puññabījassa vapanaṭhānaṃ khettabhūtaṃ
anya-e0601n:629_5: vā, attano kārakaṃ pavati sodhetīti puññaṃ, kusalaṃ. Pudhātu sodhane ṇyo. Atha vā
anya-e0601n:629_6: paraṃ pujjabhāvaṃ janetīti puññaṃ, sadā pūjitaṃ vā janetīti puññaṃ, kusalaṃ. Pūjasaddūpapada
anya-e0601n:629_7: janadhātu ṇyo. Niruttinayena saddasiddhi veditabbā. Avasesaṃ apuññaṃ punāti sodhetīti
anya-e0601n:629_8: vā puññaṃ, kusalaṃ. Pudhātu sodhane ṇyo. Khittaṃ vuttaṃ bījaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti khettaṃ,
anya-e0601n:629_9: kedārādi. Khipasaddūpapada tādhātu rakkhane kvi. Bījāni vapantānaṃ manussānaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena
anya-e0601n:629_10: bījaṃ rakkhatīti attho. Atha vā khipanti vapanti ettha bījānīti khettaṃ. Khipadhātu
anya-e0601n:629_11: peraṇe khepe vā ta. Khettaṃ viyāti khetto. Dhammarājā. Nītatthena pana puññabījāni
anya-e0601n:629_12: vapantānaṃ sattānaṃ mahapphala bhāvakaraṇena khittaṃ vuttaṃ puññabījaṃ tāyati rakkhatīti
anya-e0601n:629_13: khetto. Atha vā nibbānatthikehi puññabījāni khipiyanti vapiyanti etthāti khetto.
anya-e0601n:629_14: Dhammarājāti kātabbo. Puññānaṃ khettaṃ puññakkhetto, dhammarājā. Yathā hi rañño vā
anya-e0601n:629_15: amaccādīnaṃ vā sālīnaṃ vā yavānaṃ vā virūhanaṭṭhānaṃ rañño vā amaccādīnaṃ vā sālikhettaṃ
anya-e0601n:629_16: yavakhettanti vuccati. Evaṃ dhammarājā sabbalokassa puññamahabbalabhāvakaraṇena puññānaṃ
anya-e0601n:629_17: virūha naṭṭhānaṃ dhammarājaṃ nissāya sattalokassa nānāppakārahita sukhasaṃvattanikāni
anya-e0601n:629_18: puññāni virūhanti, tasmā dhammarājā puññakkhettanti abhitthavitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ puññakkhettaṃ.
anya-e0601n:630_0: Paramasukhadanti uttamaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ dadamānaṃ. Vuttañhi “nibbānaṃ paramaṃ sukha”nti.
anya-e0601n:630_1: Ettha ca paramasaddo uttamatthavācako anipphannapāṭi padiko. Atha vā paraṃ atirekaṃ
anya-e0601n:630_2: ariyehi mānitabbanti paramaṃ, nibbānaṃ. Parapubbamādhātu māne a. Pakārena ariyehi
anya-e0601n:630_3: ramiyati etthāti vā paramaṃ, nibbānaṃ. Papubbaramudhātu ramane ṇa. Abhidhānaṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:630_4: pana “paraṃ paccanīkaṃ māretīti paramaṃ. Pakaṭṭhabhāve ramatīti paramaṃ. Ṇo”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:630_5: Tassa sukhaṃ paramasukhaṃ. Paramaṃ uttamaṃ vā sukhaṃ paramasukhaṃ. Taṃ dadātīti paramasukhado,
anya-e0601n:630_6: dhammarājā. Paramasukhasaddūpapada dādhātu dāne kvi. Dhammarājā pana veneyyasattānaṃ
anya-e0601n:630_7: dhammadesanāya ca catupaccayappaṭiggahaṇena ca nibbānasukhaṃ detīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:630_8: Taṃ paramasukhadaṃ. Dhammarājanti buddhaṃ. So hi lokiya lokuttaradhammehi devamanussānaṃ
anya-e0601n:630_9: rañjeti tosetīti dhammarājāti. Atha vā pāramīdhammeneva buddhattaṃ patvā rājā jātoti
anya-e0601n:630_10: dhammarājāti. Pāramīdhammeneva jāto vā rājāti dhammarājāti ca vuccati. Taṃ dhammarājaṃ
anya-e0601n:631_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Yo dhammarājā muha paṭighāsādiullolavīciṃ mohadosataṇhādisaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0601n:631_1: mahātaraṅga khuddakaūmikaṃ, saṃsāroghaṃ saṃsārasaṅkhātaṃ oghaṃ samuddajalappavāhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:631_2: Maggoḷumpena aṭṭhamaggaṅgasaṅkhātena kullena tari atariṃ, abhayaṃ khemaṃ, jātiādīnaṃ
anya-e0601n:631_3: abhāvato nibbhayaṃ vā, pārapattaṃ nibbānapāraṃ pattaṃ adhigataṃ, pajānaṃ sabba sattānaṃ,
anya-e0601n:631_4: tāṇaṃ tāyanaṭṭhena tāṇaṃ rakkhaṇaṃ. Leṇaṃ nilīyanaṭṭhena leṇaṃ nilīyanaṃ, asamasaraṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:631_5: sabbasattānaṃ asadisaavassayanaṃ, ekatitthaṃ nibbānapāragamanānaṃ ekatittha bhūtaṃ,
anya-e0601n:631_6: patiṭṭhaṃ sabbasattānaṃ mahādīpaṃ viya patiṭṭhaṃ ādhārabhūtaṃ, puññakkhettaṃ nibbānasukhatthikānaṃ
anya-e0601n:631_7: puññabījassa khettabhūtaṃ, puññatthikānaṃ puññabījassa vapanaṭṭhānaṃ khettabhūtaṃ
anya-e0601n:631_8: vā, paramasukhaṃ uttamaṃ nibbānasukhaṃ dadamānaṃ, dhammarājaṃ buddhaṃ lokiyalokuttara
anya-e0601n:631_9: dhammehi pajānaṃ rañjāpanaṃ vā, pāramīdhammeneva buddhabhāvaṃ jātaṃ buddhaṃ vā, ahaṃ
anya-e0601n:638_0: 19. Evaṃ aṭṭhārasamagāthāya dhammarājaṃ vanditvā idāni sāvatthiyaṃ kaṇḍambamūle iddhipāṭiherādīhi
anya-e0601n:638_1: guṇehi munindassa thometvā vanditukāmo kaṇḍambaṃmūletyādi gāthamāha. Ayaṃ pana matanayayayagaṇehi
anya-e0601n:638_2: ca pañca yati chayati sattaya tīhi ca racitattā aṭṭhārasakkharehi yuttā kusumitalatā
anya-e0601n:638_3: vellitāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhi vuttodaye “mo to no yo yā kusumitalatā vellitākkhutvisīhī”ti.
anya-e0601n:638_4: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ akkhutvisīhi pañcayati chayati sattayatīhi
anya-e0601n:638_5: mogaṇo ca togaṇo ca nogaṇo ca yogaṇo ca yā yagaṇadvayañca ce yuttā, sā gāthā kusumitalatā
anya-e0601n:638_6: vellitā kusumitalatā vellitā gāthā nāmāti. Ettha ca akkhasaddassa pañcindriyavācakattā
anya-e0601n:638_8: chabbidhattā utusaddo chasaṅkhyāvācakoti. Isisaddo vipassīādīnaṃ buddhānaṃ sattavidhattā
anya-e0601n:639_0: Tattha pana parahitakaro yo munindo kaṇḍambamūle nisinno pāṭiheraṃ sīghaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0601n:639_1: taṃ munindaṃ ahaṃ vande vandāmīti sambandho. Atthakkamena panettha vaṇṇayissāmi.
anya-e0601n:639_2: Parahitakaroti attanā paresaṃ sabbasattānaṃ hitaṃ atthaṃ karonto. Hinoti vaḍḍhati
anya-e0601n:639_3: sukhaṃ etenāti hitaṃ, atthaṃ payojanaṃ vā. Hidhātu vaḍḍhane ta. Taṃsamaṅgino lokiyalokuttarasukhaṃ
anya-e0601n:639_4: vaḍḍhatīti attho. Paresaṃ hitaṃ parahitaṃ, taṃ karotīti parahitakaro, munindo. So
anya-e0601n:639_5: hi dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato pādamūle laddhabyākaraṇato paṭṭhāya attano sukhaṃ pajahanto
anya-e0601n:639_6: sattalokassa hitasukhatthāya kappasata sahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni samatiṃsapāramiyo
anya-e0601n:639_7: pañcamahāpariccāge ca karonto sabbaññubuddhabhāvaṃ pattakāle ca pañcacattālīsavassāni
anya-e0601n:639_8: dhamma desanāya sattalokassa lokiyalokuttarahita sukhaṃ karotīti parahitakaroti thometi.
anya-e0601n:639_9: Yoti yo yādiso. Munindoti buddho. So hi agāriya muni, anagāriyamuni, sekkhamuni,
anya-e0601n:639_10: asekkhamuni, paccekamunivasena pañcannaṃ munīnaṃ indoti munindoti vuccati. Kaṇḍambamūleti
anya-e0601n:639_11: ettha kaṇḍaambamūleti padacchedo. Chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ bindāgamo. Kaṇḍanāmikena
anya-e0601n:639_12: pasenadīkosalarañño uyyānapālena ropitassa setambarukkhassa samīpeti attho. Ettha
anya-e0601n:639_13: ca kaṇḍanti tasseva nāmaṃ. Atha vā kaṃ vuccati sukhaṃ, taṃ ḍeti gacchati pāpuṇātīti
anya-e0601n:639_14: kaṇḍo, uyyānapālo. Kaṃsaddūpapadaḍi dhātu gatiyaṃ ṇa. Kaṃ vuccati vā udakaṃ, taṃ
anya-e0601n:639_15: rukkhesu siñcanaṃ ṭināti jānātīti kaṇḍo, uyyānapālo uyyāna nāyako vā. Phalakāmehi
anya-e0601n:639_16: janehi amiyati gamiyatīti ambo, setambarukkho. Amadhātu gatiyaṃ bo. Kaṇḍanāmikena
anya-e0601n:639_17: uyyānapālena ropito ambo kaṇḍambo, tassa mūlaṃ samīpanti kaṇḍambamūlaṃ, tasmiṃ kaṇḍambamūle.
anya-e0601n:640_0: Nisinnoti vasamāno. Vimhāpaniyaṭṭhena accheraṃ. Ayañhi accherasaddo vimhayatthavācako
anya-e0601n:640_1: anipphannapāṭi padiko. Atha vā ābhuso vimhayo carati pavattatīti accheraṃ, pāṭiheraṃ.
anya-e0601n:640_2: Āpubba caradhātu gatiyaṃ a. Caradhātussaccherādeso. Ākārassa rasso. Andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ
anya-e0601n:640_3: viya niccaṃ na carati na pavattatīti accheraṃ, pāṭiheraṃ. Napubba caradhātu gatiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:640_4: a. Yathā hi andhassa pabbātārohanaṃ niccaṃ na hoti, kadāciyeva hoti, evameva bhagavato
anya-e0601n:640_5: pāṭihāriyaṃ niccaṃ na hoti, kadāciyeva hoti. Tasmā taṃ accheranti vuccati. Tena vuttaṃ
anya-e0601n:640_6: nettiaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “yaṃ abhiṇhaṃ na pavattati, taṃ acchariya”nti. Atha vā accharaṃ
anya-e0601n:640_7: paharituṃ yogganti acchariyaṃ. Yoggataddhite ṇiyapaccayo. Acchariyanti hi vattabbe
anya-e0601n:640_8: chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ iyasaddalopena accheranti vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ sīlakkhandhavaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:640_9: “andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva saddanayo. Ayaṃ
anya-e0601n:640_10: pana aṭṭhakathānayo, accharāyogganti acchariyaṃ, accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttanti attho”ti.
anya-e0601n:640_11: Nayanasubhaganti devamanussānaṃ pasādacakkhussa sobhanapattaṃ. Samavisamaṃ dassentaṃ
anya-e0601n:640_12: attabhāvaṃ netīti nayanaṃ, pasādacakkhu. Nīdhātu naye yu. Tassa subhaṃ sobhanaṃ gacchatīti
anya-e0601n:640_13: nayanasubhagaṃ, pāṭiheraṃ. Nayanasubha saddūpapadagamudhātu gatiyaṃ kvi. Taṃ nayanasubhagaṃ.
anya-e0601n:641_0: Ākulaṇṇaggijālanti ettha ākulaaṇṇaaggijālanti padacchedo. Parikiṇṇa udakadhāra aggisikhāvantaṃ.
anya-e0601n:641_1: Atha vā parisamantato kulaṃ pakiṇṇaṃ aññamaññamissakaṃ yamakaṃ yamakaṃ udakajālaaggijālavantanti
anya-e0601n:641_2: attho. Ābhuso kulati udakaggijālaṃ aññamaññamissakaṃ karotīti ākulaṃ, udakaggijālaṃ.
anya-e0601n:641_3: Āpubbakuladhātu karaṇe a. Ābhusaṃ kulati bandhati aññamaññanti vā ākulaṃ. Atha vā
anya-e0601n:641_4: āsamantato kulati yamakaṃ yamakaṃ udakaggijālaṃ pavattatīti ākulaṃ, udakaggijālaṃ.
anya-e0601n:641_5: Udakajālaṃ aggijālena aggijālañca udakajālena sammisso hotīti attho. Ananti jīvanti
anya-e0601n:641_6: etena sattāti aṇṇaṃ, udakaṃ. Anadhātu jīvāyaṃ a. Nassa ṇo. Tassa dvittaṃ. Dvibhāvo
anya-e0601n:641_7: vā. Atha vā arati gacchati taṃ taṃ ṭhānanti aṇṇaṃ. Aradhātu gatimhito. Tassa annādeso,
anya-e0601n:641_8: dhātvantalopo, nnassa ṇṇattaṃ. Aṇṇassa dhāraṃ aṇṇaṃ. Uttarapadalopena. Kuṭilabhāvena
anya-e0601n:641_9: ajati gacchatīti aggi, ajadhātu gatiyaṃ i. Jassa ggo. Jalati dibbatīti jālaṃ, sikhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:641_10: Jaladhātu dittiyaṃ ṇa. Aggino jālaṃ aggijālaṃ. Aṇṇañca aggijālañca aṇṇaggijālaṃ,
anya-e0601n:641_11: ākulaṃ parikiṇṇaṃ aṇṇaggijālaṃ assāti ākulaṇṇaggijālaṃ, yamaka pāṭiheraṃ labbhati.
anya-e0601n:642_0: Dujjāladdhaṃsanti duṭṭhu diṭṭhivādasaṅkhātajālaṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ. Duṭṭhu jalati bandhati
anya-e0601n:642_1: saṃsāravaṭṭeti dujjālaṃ, diṭṭhivādajālaṃ. Titthiya vādo hi natthi dinnantiādinayapavatto
anya-e0601n:642_2: saṃsārato nissaritumappadānavasena jālasadisattā dujjālanti attho. Dupubba jaladhātu
anya-e0601n:642_3: bandhane ṇo. Taṃ dhaṃsati viddhaṃsatīti dujjāladdhaṃsaṃ, yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ. Munibhijahitanti
anya-e0601n:642_4: munibhi ajahitanti padacchedo. Tattha munibhīti sabbasammāsambuddhehi. Te hi monaṃ
anya-e0601n:642_5: vuccati sabbaññutañāṇaṃ, taṃ etesaṃ atthīti munīti vuccanti. Kāyamoneyya vacīmoneyya
anya-e0601n:642_6: manomoneyyaṃ etesaṃ atthīti vā muni. Assatthitaddhite ṇīpaccayo. Atha vā idhaloka
anya-e0601n:642_7: paralokaṃ attahita parahitaṃ hitāhitañca munanti jānantīti munīti vuccanti. Tehi munībhi.
anya-e0601n:643_0: Ajahitanti avijahitaṃ apariccattaṃ vā, hātabbaṃ cajitabbanti jahitaṃ. Hādhātu cāge
anya-e0601n:643_1: ta. Na jahitaṃ ajahitaṃ, pāṭiheraṃ. Taṃ ajahitaṃ. Bhagavato hi sāvatthinagarassa
anya-e0601n:643_2: dakkhiṇadvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle kataṃ pāṭihāriyañca bhagavā pana tasmiṃ pāṭihāriyāvasāne
anya-e0601n:643_3: tāvatiṃsapuraṃ gato, tasmiṃ pārichattakamūlamhi paṇḍukambalanāmake silāsane sannisinno
anya-e0601n:643_4: devānaṃ abhidhammakathāya desanā ca sabbasammāsambuddhehi avijahitā dhammatāyeva
anya-e0601n:643_5: hotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Buddhavaṃsaṭṭhakathāyañhi samatiṃsadhammatāpakāsane sāvatthi
anya-e0601n:643_6: nagaradvāre yamakapāṭihāriyakaraṇaṃ. Tāvatiṃse bhavane abhidhammadesanāti dhammatābhāvena
anya-e0601n:644_0: Pāṭiheranti paccanīkapaṭiharaṇavasena pāṭihāriyaṃ, paṭipakkhe titthiye madditvā hinoti
anya-e0601n:644_1: pavattatīti pāṭiheraṃ. Paṭipubbahidhātu gatiyaṃ ṇo. Hissa heraṇideso. Atha vā bhagavato
anya-e0601n:644_2: ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhe titthiye harati apanetīti pāṭiheraṃ, iddhividhañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:644_3: Paṭipubbaharadhātu apanayane ṇo. Paṭiharati apaneti sattānaṃ diṭṭhimānopagatāni cittānīti
anya-e0601n:644_4: vā pāṭiheraṃ. Appasannānaṃ pasādaṃ āharatīti vā pāṭiheraṃ. Samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese
anya-e0601n:644_5: katakiccena paṭipacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti vā pāṭiheraṃ. Paṭīti hi ayaṃsaddo
anya-e0601n:644_6: pacchāti etassa atthaṃ bodheti. Tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi añño āgacchi brāhmaṇotiādīsu
anya-e0601n:644_7: viya. Atha vā paṭipunappunaṃ udakaggijālaṃ abbocchinnaṃ yamakaṃ yamakaṃ hutvā harati
anya-e0601n:644_8: pavattatīti pāṭiheraṃ, yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ. Tañca pana iddhipāṭihāriya, ādesanāpāṭihāriya,
anya-e0601n:644_9: anusā sanī pāṭihāriyavasena tividhaṃ hoti. Tesu pana idha iddhipāṭihāriyaṃ adhippetanti.
anya-e0601n:644_10: Sīghanti khippaṃ āsuṃ lahuṃ vā. Taṃ pana akāsītipade kriyāvisesanaṃ. Seti lahu hutvā
anya-e0601n:644_11: pavattatīti sīghaṃ. Sidhātu gatimhi ghapaccayo. Dīgho. Akāsīti akari.
anya-e0601n:645_0: Ettha ca pāṭihāriyamevaṃ veditabbaṃ. Bhagavā hi abhisambodhito sattame saṃvacchare
anya-e0601n:645_1: sāvatthinagarassa dakkhiṇadvāre kaṇḍambarukkhamūle devānamindena sakkena āṇāpitena
anya-e0601n:645_2: visukammadevaputtena nimmite dvādasayojane ratana maṇḍape bhagavatā nimmite yojanappamāṇe
anya-e0601n:645_3: ratanapallaṅke ratanacaṅkame ca nisīditvā tiyojanike dibbasetacchatte dhārayamāne
anya-e0601n:645_4: samantato dvādasayojanāya parisāya atthādānaparidīpanaṃ titthiyamaddanaṃ uparimakāyato
anya-e0601n:645_5: aggikkhandho pavattati, heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattati, heṭṭhimakāyato aggikkhandho,
anya-e0601n:645_6: uparimakāyato udakadhārā. Puratthimakāyato aggikkhandho, pacchimakāyato udakadhārā.
anya-e0601n:645_7: Pacchimakāyato aggikkhandho, puratthimakāyato udakadhārā, dakkhiṇaakkhito aggikkhandho,
anya-e0601n:645_8: vāmaakkhito udakadhārā. Vāmaakkhito aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇaakkhito udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato
anya-e0601n:645_9: aggikkhandho, vāmakaṇṇasotato udakadhārā. Vāmakaṇṇasotato aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇakaṇṇasotato
anya-e0601n:645_10: udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇa nāsikāsotato aggikkhandho, vāmanāsikāso tato udakadhārā. Vāmanāsikāsotato
anya-e0601n:645_11: aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇanāsikāsotato udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato aggikkhandho, vāmaaṃsakūṭato
anya-e0601n:645_12: udakadhārā. Vāmaaṃsakūṭato aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭato udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇahatthato
anya-e0601n:645_13: aggikkhandho, vāmahatthato udakadhārā. Vāmahatthato aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇahatthato
anya-e0601n:645_14: udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇapassato aggikkhandho, vāmapassato udakadhārā. Vāmapassato aggikkhandho,
anya-e0601n:645_15: dakkhiṇapassato udakadhārā. Dakkhiṇapādato aggikkhandho, vāmapādato udakadhārā. Vāmapādato
anya-e0601n:645_16: aggikkhandho, dakkhiṇapādato udakadhārā. Aṅgulaṅgulehi aggikkhandho, aṅgulantarikāhi
anya-e0601n:645_17: udakadhārā. Aṅgulantarikāhi aggikkhandho, aṅgulaṅgulehi udakadhārā. Ekekalomato aggikkhandho,
anya-e0601n:645_18: ekekalomato udakadhārā. Lomakūpato lomakūpato aggikkhandho, lomakūpato lomakūpato
anya-e0601n:645_19: udakadhārā pavattati. Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ nīlānaṃ pītānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:645_20: pabhassarānaṃ ubbahanabhūtānaṃ yamakā yamakā vaṇṇā pavattanti. Bhagavā caṅkamati,
anya-e0601n:645_21: nimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Bhagavā tiṭṭhati, nimmito caṅkamati
anya-e0601n:645_22: vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Bhagavā nisīdati, nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati
anya-e0601n:645_23: vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Bhagavā seyyaṃ kappeti, nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati
anya-e0601n:645_24: vā. Nimmito caṅkamati, bhagavā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Nimmito
anya-e0601n:645_25: tiṭṭhati, bhagavā caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Nimmito nisīdati, bhagavā
anya-e0601n:645_26: caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti. Nimmito seyyaṃ kappeti, bhagavā caṅkamati
anya-e0601n:645_27: vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vāti vividhaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ titthiyānaṃ maddanatthāya
anya-e0601n:645_28: akāsīti. Ettha ca pana yo koci evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ kātuṃ samattho ce. So āgacchatūti
anya-e0601n:645_29: codanāsadisattā vuttaṃ atthādānaparidīpananti. Atthādānañhi anuyogo, paṭipakkhassa
anya-e0601n:645_30: atthassa ādānaṃ gahaṇanti katvā, tassa paridīpanaṃ atthādānaparidīpanaṃ. Titthiyamaddananti
anya-e0601n:645_31: pāṭihāriyaṃ karissāmāti kuhāyanavasena pubbe uṭṭhitānaṃ titthiyānaṃ maddanaṃ. Tañca
anya-e0601n:645_32: tathā kātuṃ asamatthatā sampādanameva. Tadetaṃ padadvayaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyanti etena sambandhitabbanti.
anya-e0601n:646_0: Seṭṭhanti pasatthataraṃ. Tassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Paramaratijanti devamanussānaṃ
anya-e0601n:646_1: uttamaratiṃ janakaṃ. Paramānaṃ uttamasādhūnaṃ cittaramanaṃ janāpetaṃ vā, ettha ca
anya-e0601n:646_2: paṭhamavikappe paramasaddo uttamavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko nipāto. Dutiyavikappe
anya-e0601n:646_3: sādhuvācako nipphannapāṭipadiko. Devamanussānaṃ paramaṃ uttamaṃ ratiṃ janetīti paramaratijo,
anya-e0601n:646_4: munindo. Paramaratisaddūpapada janadhātu janane kvi. Atha vā pakārena saddhamme ramantīti
anya-e0601n:646_5: paramā, sādhū labbhanti. Papubba ramudhātu kīḷāyaṃ a. Tesaṃ cittassa ratiṃ ramanaṃ
anya-e0601n:646_6: janetīti paramaratijo, munindo. Taṃ paramaratijaṃ. So hi dhamma desanāya ca pāṭihāriyena
anya-e0601n:646_7: iddhiyā sarīrasobhagga sampattiādīhi ca devamanussānaṃ cittassa abhiratiṃ abhikkantaṃ
anya-e0601n:647_0: Iddhidhammehupetanti iddhidhammehi upetanti padacchedo. Iddhi dhammehīti acinteyyaappameyyehi
anya-e0601n:647_1: buddhaiddhisaṅkhātaguṇehi. Dhammasaddo hi guṇe vattati buddhadhammātiādīsu viya.
anya-e0601n:647_2: Ijjhanaṃ samijjhanaṃ iddhi. Ijjhati samijjhatīti vā iddhi. Ijjhati samijjhati yathicchitattho
anya-e0601n:647_3: etāyāti iddhi. Idhadhātu vuddhiyaṃ i, tipaccayo vā. Bhagavā etāya iddhiyā yathicchitattho
anya-e0601n:647_4: iddho vuddho ukkaṃsagato hotīti attho. Dhāreti pakāseti taṃsamaṅgino dabbanti dhammo,
anya-e0601n:647_5: guṇo. Iddhieva dhammo iddhidhammo, tehi dhammehi. Upetanti samannāgataṃ. Upagacchati
anya-e0601n:647_6: sampajjatīti upeto, munindo. Upapubbaidhātu gatiyaṃ ta. Taṃ upetaṃ.
anya-e0601n:648_0: Iddhi pana adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikuppanā iddhi, manomayā iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā iddhi,
anya-e0601n:648_1: samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi, puññavato iddhi, vijjāmayā
anya-e0601n:648_2: iddhi, tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi cāti dasavidhā hoti.
anya-e0601n:648_3: Tattha pakatiyā eko bahukaṃ āpajjati. Sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti
anya-e0601n:648_4: bahuko homīti evaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā iddhi adhiṭṭhāna vasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhānā
anya-e0601n:648_5: iddhi nāma. Pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumāravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:648_6: vā yakkhavaṇṇaṃ vā…pe… vividhampi senābyūhaṃ dassetīti evaṃ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena
anya-e0601n:648_7: pavattattā vikuppanā iddhi nāma. Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti
anya-e0601n:648_8: rūpaṃ manomayanti iminā nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrabbhantare aññasseva manomayassa
anya-e0601n:648_9: sarīrassa nipphattivasena pavattattā manomayā iddhi nāma. Ñāṇuppattito pubbe vā pacchā
anya-e0601n:648_10: vā taṅkhaṇe vā ñāṇānubhāvanibbattā visesā ñāṇavipphārā iddhi nāma. Ettha ca āyasmato
anya-e0601n:648_11: bākulattherassa ca āyasmato saṃkiccattherassa ca āyasmato bhūtapālattherassa ca ñāṇavipphārā
anya-e0601n:648_12: iddhi veditabbā. Samādhito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṅkhaṇe vā samathānubhāvena nibbattā
anya-e0601n:648_13: visesā samādhivipphārā iddhi nāma. Ettha ca āyasmato sāriputtattherassa ca āyasmato
anya-e0601n:648_14: sañjīvattherassa ca āyasmato khāṇukoṇḍaññattherassa ca uttarāya upāsikāya ca sāmāvatiyā
anya-e0601n:649_0: Paṭikūlādīsu appaṭikūlasaññī vihārādikā pana ariyā iddhi nāma. Pakkhidevādīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā
anya-e0601n:649_1: kamma vipākajā iddhi nāma. Yathāha “katamā vipākajā iddhi. Sabbesaṃ pakkhīnaṃ sabbesaṃ
anya-e0601n:649_2: devānaṃ ekaccānaṃ manussānaṃ ekaccā nañca vinipātikānaṃ ayaṃ kammavipākajā iddhī”tiādi.
anya-e0601n:649_3: Cakkavattiādīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā pana puññavato iddhi nāma. Yathāha “katamā puññavato
anya-e0601n:649_4: iddhi. Rājā cakkavatti vehāsaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya antamaso assabandhagobandhapurise
anya-e0601n:649_5: upādāya. Jotikassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi. Jaṭilassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi.
anya-e0601n:649_6: Ghosakassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi. Meṇḍakassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi. Pañcannaṃ
anya-e0601n:649_7: mahāpuññānaṃ puññavato iddhī”ti. Vijjādharādīnaṃ vehāsagamanādikā pana vijjāmayā
anya-e0601n:649_8: iddhi nāma. Ettha ca ādisaddena ākāse antalikkhe hatthimpi dasseti. Assampi…pe… vividhampi
anya-e0601n:649_9: senābyūhaṃ dasseti tyādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Tena tena sammāpayogena tassa tassa kammassa
anya-e0601n:649_10: ijjhanaṃ tattha tattha sammā payogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi nāma.
anya-e0601n:650_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepo. Vitthāro pana paṭisambhidāmagge iddhikathāya ca visuddhimaggaṭṭhakathāya
anya-e0601n:650_1: ca gahetabbo. Tāsu pana iddhīsu bhagavato ṭhapetvā vijjāmayiddhiṃ avasesā atthīti
anya-e0601n:650_2: veditabbā. Atha vā bhagavato tīhi vijjāhi ca aṭṭhahi vijjāhi ca samannāgatattā sabbā
anya-e0601n:650_3: buddhaiddhiyo santīti vijjāmayiddhipi labbhatīti daṭṭhabbā. Taṃ munindaṃ ahaṃ vande
anya-e0601n:651_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepatthayojanā. Parahitakaro attanā paresaṃ sabbasattānaṃ atthaṃ
anya-e0601n:651_1: payojanaṃ karonto, yo munindo yo yādiso buddho, kaṇḍambaṃmūle kaṇḍanāmikena pasenadikosalarañño
anya-e0601n:651_2: uyyānapālena ropitassa setambarukkhassa samīpe sannisinno vasamāno accheraṃ vimhāpanīyaṃ
anya-e0601n:651_3: nayanasubhagaṃ devamanussānaṃ pasāda cakkhussa sobhanapattaṃ ākulaṇṇaggijālaṃ parikiṇṇaudaka
anya-e0601n:651_4: dhāraaggisikhavantaṃ parisamantato kulaṃ parikiṇṇaṃ aññamañña missakaṃ yamakaṃ yamakaṃ
anya-e0601n:651_5: udakajālaaggijālavantaṃ vā, dujjāladdhaṃsaṃ duṭṭhuṃ micchādiṭṭhivādasaṅkhātaṃ jālaṃ
anya-e0601n:651_6: viddhaṃsitaṃ, munibhijahitaṃ sabbasammāsambuddhehi avijahitaṃ, pāṭiheraṃ paccanīka
anya-e0601n:651_7: paṭihārakaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ udakaggiyamakaṃyamakaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ vā, sīghaṃ khippaṃ akāsi
anya-e0601n:651_8: akari, seṭṭhaṃ pasatthataraṃ, paramaratijaṃ devamanussānaṃ uttamaratiṃ janakaṃ uttamānaṃ
anya-e0601n:651_9: sādhūnaṃ cittaramanaṃ janāpetaṃ vā, iddhidhammehi acinteyyaappameyyehi buddhaiddhi
anya-e0601n:651_10: guṇehi upetaṃ samannāgataṃ, taṃ munindaṃ ahaṃ sirasā vande vandāmīti.
anya-e0601n:653_0: 20. Munindakko yveko dayudayaruṇo ñāṇavitthiṇṇabimbo, vineyyappāṇoghaṃ kamalakathitaṃ
anya-e0601n:653_1: dhammaraṃsīvarehi. Subodhesī suddhe tibhavakuhare byāpitakkittinañca, tilokekaccakkhuṃ
anya-e0601n:654_0: 20. Evaṃ ekūnavīsatimāya gāthāya munindaṃ vanditvā idāni vineyyappāṇoghaṃ dhammadesanāya
anya-e0601n:654_1: catusaccadhammaṃ bodhaneyyādīhi navahi guṇehi thomitvā munindakkaṃ vanditukāmo munindakkotyādigāthamāha.
anya-e0601n:654_2: Ayaṃ pana ya ma na sa ra ragaṇehi ca ekagarunā ca chayatīhi ca sattayatīhi ca racitattā
anya-e0601n:654_4: ymā na sa ra ra garū meghavipphujjitā sā”ti. Ayaṃ panettha yojanā. Yassaṃ paṭipādaṃ
anya-e0601n:654_5: rasutvassehi cha cha satta yatīhi ymā yagaṇamagaṇā ca na sa rara garū nagaṇa sagaṇa
anya-e0601n:654_6: ragaṇa ragaṇa ekagaru ca ce yuttā, sā gāthā meghavipphujjitā megha vipphujjitā gāthā
anya-e0601n:654_7: nāmāti. Ettha ca rasānaṃ kasāva titta madhuralavaṇa ambila kaṭukavasena chabbidhattā
anya-e0601n:654_8: rasasaddo chasaṅkhyāvācakoti daṭṭhabbo. Utūnaṃ hemanta sisīra vasanta gimhavassānasaradavasena
anya-e0601n:654_9: chabbidhattā utusaddo chasaṅkhyāvācakoti. Assasaddo sattasaṅkhyāvācakoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:655_0: Tattha pana dayudayaruṇo ñāṇavitthiṇṇabimbo eko yo munindakko suddhe tibhavakuhare
anya-e0601n:655_1: kamalakathitaṃ vineyyappāṇoghaṃ dhammaraṃsīvarehi subodhesi byāpitakkitti nañca tilokekaccakkhuṃ
anya-e0601n:655_2: dukhamasahanaṃ mahesiṃ taṃ munindakkaṃ namāmīti yojanā.
anya-e0601n:656_0: Imissā gāthāya ca atthakkameneva sukhajānanatthaṃ vaṇṇayissāma, na saddakkamena.
anya-e0601n:656_2: Atha vā udayapabbatato uggatasūriyāruṇo viya mahākaruṇā vāti attho. Ettha ca dayāsaddo
anya-e0601n:656_3: karuṇāmettāsu vattati. Adayāti vuccati nikkaruṇatanti ettha hi karuṇāyaṃ. Dayāpannoti
anya-e0601n:656_4: ettha mettāyaṃ vattati. Mettācittataṃ āpannoti attho. Idha pana karuṇā adhippetā.
anya-e0601n:657_0: Ayaṃ pana vacanattho. Dayati hiṃsati kāruṇikaṃ yāva yathādhippetaṃ parassa hitanibbattiṃ
anya-e0601n:657_1: na pāpuṇāti tāvāti dayā, mahākaruṇā. Dayadhātu hiṃsāyaṃ a. Dayati anuggaṇhāti pāpajanampi
anya-e0601n:657_2: etāyāti vā dayā. Dayadhātu anuggahaṇe. Dayati attano sukhampi pahāya khedaṃ gaṇhātīti
anya-e0601n:657_3: vā dayā. Dayadhātu gahaṇe. Atha vā dayanti gaṇhanti etāya bodhisattā saṃsāradukkhañca
anya-e0601n:657_4: sabbaññutañāṇañcāti dayā, mahākaruṇā. Mahābodhisattā hi buddhabhāvāya abhinīhārakaraṇakāle
anya-e0601n:657_5: hatthagatampi arahatta phalaṃ chaṭṭetvā saṃsārasāgarato satte samuddharitukāmā anassāsakaraṃ
anya-e0601n:657_6: atibhayānakaṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ pacchimabhave ca saha amatadhātupaṭilābhena anekaguṇasamalaṅkataṃ
anya-e0601n:657_7: sabbaññutañāṇañca gaṇhantīti attho. Karuṇāmūlakā hi sabbe buddhaguṇā. Tena vuttaṃ
anya-e0601n:658_0: Api ca dayanti anurakkhanti satte etāya, sayaṃ vā anuddayati anudayamattameva vā
anya-e0601n:658_1: etanti dayā. Dayadhātu anurakkhaṇe apaccayo. Udeti vaḍḍhetīti udayo, pabbato. Udidhātu
anya-e0601n:658_2: pasavane ṇa. Āsamantato ālokaṃ karonto uṇati gacchatīti aruṇo, sūriyaraṃsī viseso.
anya-e0601n:658_3: Āpubbauṇadhātu gatiyaṃ ṇa. Dayāsaṅkhātato udayapabbatato uggatasūriyassa aruṇo yassāti
anya-e0601n:658_4: dayudayaruṇo. Atha vā udayapabbatato uggatasūriyāruṇo viya dayā mahākaruṇā yassāti
anya-e0601n:658_5: dayudayaruṇo, munindakko. Yathā hi uggatasūriyassa aruṇo ālokassa ādi hoti, evaṃ
anya-e0601n:658_6: bodhisatto dīpaṅkarabuddhassa pādamūle karopayātaṃ nibbānasukhamosajja mahākaruṇāya
anya-e0601n:658_7: saṃsārasamuddato satte samuddharitukāmo buddhabhāvāya sudukkarā dānādayo dasa pāramiyo
anya-e0601n:658_8: ca pañca mahāpariccāge ca kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni akāsīti karuṇā
anya-e0601n:658_9: buddhabhāvāya ādi. Tasmā buddhasseva dayudayaruṇoti abhitthavituṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:659_1: viya vipulārammaṇa sabbaññutañāṇavā. Saṅkhatāsaṅkhatabhedaṃ sabbeñeyyadhammaṃ jānātīti
anya-e0601n:659_2: ñāṇaṃ, sabbaññutañāṇaṃ. Ñādhātu avabodhaneyu. Visesena tanoti vitthāretīti vitthiṇṇaṃ,
anya-e0601n:659_3: ñāṇaṃ. Vipubbatanudhātu vitthāre tapaccayo. Tassa iṇṇādeso. Dhātvantassa lopo, asarūpadvittaṃ.
anya-e0601n:659_4: Atha vā vittharati pattharatīti vitthiṇṇaṃ. Tharadhātumevettha viseso. Vamati parimaṇḍalākārena
anya-e0601n:659_5: gacchati pavattatīti bimbaṃ, ñāṇamaṇḍalaṃ. Vamadhātu gatiyaṃ bo. Assi. Vassa bo.
anya-e0601n:660_0: Ṇvādimoggallāne pana “vama uggiraṇe ba. Vamissa vassa bittaṃ. Vamati uggiratīti bimbaṃ,
anya-e0601n:660_1: sarīra”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana bimbasaddassa sarīravācake yuttameva. Na parimaṇḍalavācake.
anya-e0601n:660_2: Idha pana bimbasaddassa parimaṇḍalavācakattā. Ācariyā pana idha bimbasaddassa atthaṃ
anya-e0601n:660_3: cakkamaṇḍalanti vadanti. Taṃ pana vicāretabbaṃ. Kasmā, abhidhānappadīpikāyaṃ “bimbaṃ
anya-e0601n:660_4: tu paṭibimbe ca, maṇḍale bimbikāphale”ti ca. Taṭṭīkāyañca “maṇḍale paṭimaṇḍale”ti
anya-e0601n:660_5: ca vuttattā. Ñāṇaṃ sabbaññutañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ vitthiṇṇaṃ vitthāraṃ bimbaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0601n:660_6: assāti ñāṇavitthiṇṇabimbo. Atha vā vitthiṇṇaṃ vitthāraṃ bimbaṃ cakkavāḷaparimaṇḍalaṃ
anya-e0601n:660_7: viya vipulārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ sabbaññutañāṇaṃ assāti ñāṇavitthiṇṇabimbo, munindakko.
anya-e0601n:660_8: Yathā hi cakkavāḷassa anantattā cakkavāḷamaṇḍalaṃ vipulaṃ mahantaṃ hoti, eva meva
anya-e0601n:660_9: buddhassa sabbaññutañāṇaṃ anantārammaṇattā vipulaṃ mahantaṃ. Tasmā tassa ñāṇavitthiṇṇabimboti
anya-e0601n:660_10: thometīti. Yvekoti yo ekoti padacchedo. Yekotipi katthaci pāṭho. Tassa pana yo ekoti
anya-e0601n:660_11: padacchedo kātabbo. Taṃ pana pāṭhadvayaṃ yuttameva. Yvekoti hi pāṭhe ādesasandhi
anya-e0601n:660_12: hoti. Yekoti pāṭhe pana lopasandhīti ayametesaṃ viseso. Yo munindakkoti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:661_0: Ekoti asahāyo, adutiyako eka buddhabhūtoti attho. Ettha ca ekasaddo aññaseṭṭhāsahāya
anya-e0601n:661_1: saṅkhyādīsu dissati. Tathāhesa sassato attā ca loko ca, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti
anya-e0601n:661_2: ittheke abhivadantītiādīsu aññatthe dissati. Cetaso ekodibhāvantiādīsu seṭṭhe. Eko
anya-e0601n:661_3: vūpakaṭṭhotiādīsu asahāye. Ekova kho bhikkhave khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyāyātiādīsu
anya-e0601n:661_4: saṅkhyāyaṃ. Idha pana asahāye adhippeto. Ayaṃ panassa vacanattho. Asahāyo hutvā eti
anya-e0601n:661_5: gacchati pavattatīti eko, adutiyako hutvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ eti jānāti paṭivijjhatīti
anya-e0601n:661_6: vā eko, munindakko. Edhātu idhātu vā ñāṇagatīsu ṇvu. Atha vā eko bhagavā pabbajjasaṅkhātena
anya-e0601n:661_7: eko. Adutiyaṭṭhena eko, taṇhāya pahānaṭṭhena eko, ekantavītarāgoti eko, ekantavītadosoti
anya-e0601n:661_8: eko, ekantavītamohoti eko, ekantanikkilesoti eko, ekāya maggaṃ gatoti eko, anuttaraṃ
anya-e0601n:661_9: sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti ekotiādinā āgatena mahāniddesanayenapettha attho veditabbo.
anya-e0601n:662_0: Api ca anantacakkavāḷesuyeva ekova buddho eti uppajjati vikasati vāti eko. Vuttañhi
anya-e0601n:662_1: ekanipāta aṅguttara pāḷiyaṃ “aṭṭhānametaṃ bhikkhave anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā
anya-e0601n:662_2: dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Ṭhānañca
anya-e0601n:662_3: kho etaṃ bhikkhave vijjati, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā ekova arahaṃ sammāsambuddho uppajjeyya,
anya-e0601n:662_5: Tīṇi hi khettāni jātikkhettaṃ āṇakkhettaṃ visayakkhettanti. Tattha jātikkhettaṃ nāma
anya-e0601n:662_6: dasasahassilokadhātu. Sā hi tathāgatassa mātukucchiṃ okkamanakāle nikkhamanakāle
anya-e0601n:662_7: sambodhikāle dhammacakkappavattane āyu saṅkhāravossajjane parinibbāne ca kampati,
anya-e0601n:662_8: koṭisatasahassa cakkavāḷaṃ pana āṇakkhettaṃ nāma. Āṭānāṭiyaparitta moraparittadhajaggaparitta
anya-e0601n:662_9: ratanaparittādīnañhi ettha āṇā pavattati. Visayakkhettassa pana parimāṇaṃ natthi.
anya-e0601n:662_10: Buddhānañhi yāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ. Yāvatakaṃ ñeyyaṃ, tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:662_11: Ñāṇapariyantikaṃ ñeyyaṃ, ñeyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇanti vacanato avisayo nāma natthi.
anya-e0601n:662_12: Imesu pana tīsu khettesu ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantīti
anya-e0601n:662_13: suttaṃ natthi. Na uppajjantīti pana atthi. Tīṇi hi piṭakāni vinayapiṭakaṃ, suttantapiṭakaṃ,
anya-e0601n:662_14: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ. Tisso saṃgītiyo mahākassapattherassa saṃgīti, yasattherassa saṃgīti,
anya-e0601n:662_15: moggaliputtattherassa saṃgīti, imā tisso saṃgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane imaṃ
anya-e0601n:662_16: cakkavāḷaṃ muñcitvā aññattha buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi. Na uppajjantīti pana atthī”ti.
anya-e0601n:663_0: Ettha ca ekissā lokadhātuyāti dasasahassi lokadhātuyāti idaṃ jātikkhettaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0601n:663_1: vuttaṃ. Dasasahassilokadhātu hi imaṃ lokadhātuṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā hoti. Tattakānaṃyeva
anya-e0601n:663_2: jātikkhettabhāvo dhammatā vasena veditabbo. Imesu pana tīsu khettesūti iminā dasasahassilokadhātusaṅkhāte
anya-e0601n:663_4: visayakkhette cāti imesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ito cakkavāḷato aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu
anya-e0601n:663_5: buddhā nuppajjantīti dasseti. Tividhañhi buddhakkhettaṃ dassetvā imesu pana tīsu
anya-e0601n:663_6: khettesūti ādhārabhāvena vuttaṃ, na niddhāraṇabhāvena. Kasmā, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ niddhāraṇīyapadassa
anya-e0601n:663_7: abhāvato. Sati hi aṭṭhakathācariyo tassa padassa niddhāraṇatthe adhippete imesu tīsu
anya-e0601n:663_8: khettesu āṇakkhette ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷantiādi vucceyya. Na. Tasmā tassa padassa
anya-e0601n:663_9: ādhāratthoyeva gahetabbo. Pubbanissayā cariyehi ca tassa padassa ādhārabhāvena atthayojanā
anya-e0601n:663_10: katāti. Tatheva pana abhidhammañāṇavibhaṅgapāḷiyañca, tadaṭṭhakathāyañca uparipaṇṇāse
anya-e0601n:663_12: kāraṇaṃ āgatamevāti. Taṃ aṅguttaraṭīkāyaṃ pana “na uppajjantīti pana atthīti na me
anya-e0601n:663_13: ācariyo atthi, sadiso me navijjatītiādi. Imissā lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā
anya-e0601n:663_14: kiṃpanāvuso sāriputta atthetarahi añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bhagavatā samasamo sambodhiyanti
anya-e0601n:663_15: evaṃ puṭṭhohaṃ bhante noti vadeyyanti vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso,
anya-e0601n:663_16: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyunti
anya-e0601n:663_17: imaṃ suttaṃ āharantena dhamma senāpatinā ca buddhakkhettabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā
anya-e0601n:663_18: aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Tatheva pana ñāṇavibhaṅgamūlaṭīkāyaṃ,
anya-e0601n:663_19: uparipaṇṇāsabahudhātu suttaṭīkāyañca vuttaṃ. Ettha ca imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha
anya-e0601n:663_20: anuppatti vuttā hotīti iminā buddhakkhettabhūtato ito cakkavāḷato aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu
anya-e0601n:663_21: buddhānaṃ anuppatti dassitā hoti. Aññatthāti hi sāmaññena vuttepi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttena
anya-e0601n:663_22: imesu tīsu khettesūti saddantarasannidhānena anantacakkavāḷabhūto visesattho gahetabbo.
anya-e0601n:664_0: Ayaṃ panettha aparo nayo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutte buddhā hi uppajjamānā imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe
anya-e0601n:664_1: uppajjanti. Uppajjanaṭṭhāne pana vārite ito aññesu cakkavāḷesu nuppajjantīti vāritameva
anya-e0601n:664_2: hotītiettha vākye imasmiṃ yevātipade samabhiniviṭṭho evasaddo nivattāpanāvadhāraṇattho.
anya-e0601n:664_3: Etena aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ uppattiṃ nivatteti. Yadipi hi aññesu
anya-e0601n:664_4: anantacakkavāḷesu aññe buddhā uppajjeyyuṃ. Evaṃ santesu saṅkhatāsaṅkhatabhedaṃ sabbadhammaṃ
anya-e0601n:664_5: jānanto passanto amhākaṃ bhagavā aññacakkavāḷesu aññe buddhā uppajjantīti evaṃ vucceyya.
anya-e0601n:664_6: Na. Taṇhaṅkarādayo hi aṭṭhavīsati sambuddhā ito cakkavāḷato aññesu cakkavāḷesu uppajjantītivacanaṃ
anya-e0601n:664_7: tepiṭake buddhavacane natthi, tathā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkāsu ca. Tasmā ito cakkavāḷato aññesu
anya-e0601n:664_8: ananta cakkavāḷesu aññe buddhā nuppajjantīti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ suttantamahāvaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:665_0: “Athassa etadahosi mādiso buddhoyeva sakkuṇeyya. Atthi pana katthaci añño buddhoti
anya-e0601n:665_1: anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantañāṇaṃ pattharitvā olokento aññaṃ buddhaṃ na addasa. Anacchariyañcetaṃ,
anya-e0601n:665_2: yaṃ idāni attanā samaṃ na passeyya. Yo jātadivasepi brahmajālasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena
anya-e0601n:665_3: attanā samaṃ apassanto aggohamasmi lokassāti appaṭivattiyaṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi. Evaṃ
anya-e0601n:665_4: aññaṃ attanā samaṃ apassitvā cintesī”ti. Tathevetaṃ. Purābhedasutta mahāniddesaṭṭhakathāyañca,
anya-e0601n:665_5: taṃ mahāsamayasuttaṭīkāyañca ekissā lokadhātuyāti sutte āgatanayena sabbattheva pana
anya-e0601n:665_6: apubbaṃ acarimaṃ dve buddhā nāma na honteva. Tenevāha “anantāsu loka dhātūsu…pe…
anya-e0601n:666_0: Apaṇṇakajātakaṭṭhakathāyañca “satthā upāsakā heṭṭhā avīciṃ upari bhavaggaṃ paricchedaṃ
anya-e0601n:666_1: katvā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sīlādīhi guṇehi buddhena sadiso nāma natthi. Kuto adhikataro…pe…
anya-e0601n:666_2: āhā”ti vuttaṃ. Imāsu dvīsu aṭṭhakathāsu ca anantāsu lokadhātūsūti ca aparimāṇāsu
anya-e0601n:666_3: lokadhātūsūti ca anantaaparimāṇa saddena vuttaṃ. Tehi dvīhi saddehi ṭīkāvacanena
anya-e0601n:666_4: ca anantāsu lokadhātūsu aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ anuppattiṃ dasseti.
anya-e0601n:667_0: Sammohavinodanīaṭṭhakathāya yojanāyaṃ pana imesu panātiādinā koṭisatasahassa cakkavāḷato
anya-e0601n:667_1: aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā na uppajjantīti ñāpeti. Mayaṃ pana evaṃ vitakkayāma. Aññasmiṃ
anya-e0601n:667_2: cakkavāḷeti ito cakkavāḷato aññesu sabbesupi tīsu buddhakkhettesūti atthe gayhamāne
anya-e0601n:667_3: sati koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā na uppajjantīti viññāyati.
anya-e0601n:667_4: Yadi pana aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷeti ito aññasmiṃ jātiāṇākhettabhūte cakkavāḷeti atthe
anya-e0601n:667_5: gahite koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhānaṃ uppatti bhaveyyāti
anya-e0601n:667_6: viññāyati. “Aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”tiādipāḷiyā
anya-e0601n:667_7: ca. “Aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve rājāno cakkavattī”tiādipāḷiyā
anya-e0601n:667_8: saddhiṃ kathanato koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato buddhānaṃ anuppatti viya aññissā lokadhātuyā
anya-e0601n:667_9: cakkavattirañño anuppatti bhaveyya. Kathāvatthuppakaraṇe ca koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato
anya-e0601n:667_10: aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhānaṃ uppatti na paṭisedhitā. Tasmā āṇakkhettabhūtato koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato
anya-e0601n:667_11: aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhassa bhaveyyāti ayaṃ amhākaṃ khanti. Vīmaṃsetvā gahetabbanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:668_0: Ettha ca yaṃ kathāvatthuppakaraṇe ca…pe… na paṭisedhitāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana kathāvatthupāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:668_1: nattheva. Imissā pana sabbadisākathāyaṃ paravādīnaṃ parikappavacanamattameva atthi.
anya-e0601n:668_2: Tena vuttaṃ tassaṃ pāḷiyaṃ “sabbadisā buddhā tiṭṭhantīti. Āmantā. Puratthimāya disāya
anya-e0601n:668_3: buddho tiṭṭhatīti. Nahevaṃ vattabbe…pe… puratthimāya disāya buddho tiṭṭhatīti. Āmantā.
anya-e0601n:668_4: Kinnāmo so bhagavā kiṃjacco kiṃgotto, kinnāmā tassa bhagavato mātāpitaro, kinnāmaṃ
anya-e0601n:668_5: tassa bhagavato sāvakayugaṃ, ko nāmo tassa bhagavato upaṭṭhako, kiṃdisaṃ cīvaraṃ
anya-e0601n:668_6: dhāreti, kiṃdisaṃ pattaṃ dhāreti. Katarasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā nagare vā raṭṭhe vā
anya-e0601n:669_0: Tadaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “idāni sabbadisākathā nāma hoti. Tattha catūsu disāsu heṭṭhā
anya-e0601n:669_1: uparīti samantato lokadhātusannivesaṃ sabbalokadhātūsu ca buddho atthīti attano vikappasippaṃ
anya-e0601n:669_2: uppādetvā sabbadisāsu buddhā tiṭṭhantīti yesaṃ…pe… seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānaṃ, te
anya-e0601n:669_3: sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa. Paṭiññā itarassa. Puratthimāyāti puṭṭho sakyamuniṃ sandhāya
anya-e0601n:669_4: paṭikkhipati. Puna puṭṭho laddhivasena aññalokadhātuyaṃ ṭhitaṃ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
anya-e0601n:669_5: Kinnāmo so bhagavātiādi sace tvaṃ jānāsi. Nāmādivasena naṃ kathehīti codanatthaṃ
anya-e0601n:669_6: vuttaṃ. Iminā upāyena sabbattha attho veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Ettha ca catūsu disāsu…pe…
anya-e0601n:669_7: seyyathāpi mahāsaṅghikānanti iminā paravādīnaṃ laddhiṃ dasseti. Tattha pana catūsu
anya-e0601n:669_8: disāsu ca heṭṭhā ca upari ca iti evaṃ samantato lokadhātusannivesaṃ atthīti yojanā.
anya-e0601n:669_9: Yesaṃ…pe… mahāsaṅghikānanti yesaṃ paravādīnaṃ laddhi hoti. Kesaṃ laddhi viya. Mahāsaṅghikānaṃ
anya-e0601n:669_10: laddhi seyyathāpīti attho. Te sandhāyāti te paravādīpuggale sandhāya ñāṇena dhāretvā
anya-e0601n:669_11: sallakkhetvāti attho. Pucchā sakavādissāti sakavādissa sabbadisāsu buddhā tiṭṭhantīti
anya-e0601n:669_12: pucchā hoti. Paṭiññā itarassāti paravādissa paṭijānanā hoti. Puratthimāyāti puṭṭhoti
anya-e0601n:669_13: sakavādinā puratthi māyātiādinā pucchite sati. Sakyamuninti sakyavaṃsa khattiyajātibhūtaṃ
anya-e0601n:669_14: amhākaṃ gotamabuddhaṃ sandhāya. Paṭikkhipatīti paravādīpuggalo apaneti. Puna puṭṭhoti
anya-e0601n:669_15: sakavādinā puna puratthimāya buddho tiṭṭhatīti pucchite sati. Laddhivasenāti attano
anya-e0601n:669_16: aññalokadhātuyaṃ buddho atthi ca uppajjati cāti micchāladdhivasena paṭijānātīti paravādī
anya-e0601n:669_17: puggalo paṭijānāti. Yadi pana aññalokadhātuyaṃ buddho tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ sati tassa nāmagottādiṃ
anya-e0601n:669_18: tvaṃ kathehīti sakavādissa codanāvacanaṃ dassetuṃ kinnāmo so bhagavātiādimāha. Iminā
anya-e0601n:669_19: ca ito cakkavāḷato aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ abhāvaṃ dasseti. Tena
anya-e0601n:669_20: vuttaṃ kathāvatthupāḷiyaṃ “kinnāmo so bhagavā kiṃjacco…pe… janapadevāti. Nahevaṃ vattabbe”ti.
anya-e0601n:670_0: Ettha ca pana sakavādinā kinnāmotyādinā pucchite paravādīpuggalo attano laddhiyā
anya-e0601n:670_1: sabbalokadhātūsu uppajjamānānaṃ buddhānaṃ nāmādiṃ ajānanto apassanto na hevaṃ vattabbeti
anya-e0601n:670_2: paṭikkhipati. Tasmā panettha sakavādī puggalassa laddhiyā aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu
anya-e0601n:670_3: aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ uppajjanābhāvo viññāyati. Yadipi hi aññānantacakkavāḷesu aññabuddhā
anya-e0601n:670_4: uppajjeyyuṃ. Evaṃ santesu buddhassa matiṃ yathābhūtato jānanto passanto mahāpañño
anya-e0601n:670_5: iddhimā dibbacakkhuādīhi chaḷabhiññehi sampanno paṭisambhidā patto satthārā dinnamātikānayena
anya-e0601n:670_6: kathāvatthupāḷiṃ desento āyasmā mahāmoggaliputtatthero aññānantacakkavāḷesu aññabuddhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:670_7: uppattiṃ katheyya ca. Nāti. Tasmā ayaṃ kathāvatthupāḷi ca tadaṭṭhakathāvacanañca
anya-e0601n:671_0: Na pana buddhāeva aññānantacakkavāḷesu na uppajjeyyuṃ, atha kho laddhabyākaraṇā mahābodhisattā
anya-e0601n:671_1: ca paccekabodhi sattā aggasāvakamahāsāvakabodhisattā paripākindriyā sāvakabodhisattā
anya-e0601n:671_2: ca buddhakkhettabhūte imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe uppajjanti, na aññattha. Kasmā, tesu
anya-e0601n:671_3: buddhānaṃ anuppannattā, tesaṃ pana abhinīhāro pāramīsambharaṇaṃ ñāṇaparipācanañca
anya-e0601n:671_4: tasmiṃeva samijjhati, na aññattha. Tena vuttaṃ mahāpadāna suttaṭīkāyaṃ –
anya-e0601n:672_1: sāvakabodhiyā abhinīhāro sāvakapāramiyā sambharaṇaṃ paripācanañca buddhakkhettabhūte
anya-e0601n:672_2: imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe jambudīpeeva ijjhati, na aññatthā”ti. Tathevetaṃ ekanipātaaṅguttaraṭīkāyañcāti.
anya-e0601n:673_0: Etarahi pana apare ācariyā “āṇakkhettabhūtato koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷato aññesu cakkavāḷesu
anya-e0601n:673_1: buddhā uppajjantī”ti vadanti. Tesaṃ pana vacanaṃ ayuttameva. Kasmā, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:673_2: vutte aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷeti ettha aññasaddassa ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷantipadato aññassa
anya-e0601n:673_3: apādānassa asambhavato ca anantacakkavāḷesu bahūsu buddhesu uppannesu buddhassa anacchariyattā
anya-e0601n:673_4: ca. Acchariyamanusso hi sammāsambuddho. Vuttañhi ekanipāta aṅguttarapāḷiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:674_0: “Ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso. Katamo ekapuggalo,
anya-e0601n:674_1: tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. Ayaṃ kho bhikkhave ekapuggalo loke uppajjati acchariyamanusso”ti.
anya-e0601n:674_2: Aññaṃ pana kāraṇaṃ mayā heṭṭhā vuttanayenapi viññūhi viññātabbanti. Aññe pana ācariyā
anya-e0601n:679_0: Vuttāsu dvīsu gāthāsu paṭhamagāthāya atthaṃ buddhassa anādhippāyena gahetvā micchāñāṇena
anya-e0601n:679_1: aññānantacakkavāḷesu uppajjamānā buddhā asaṅkhayāti vadanti. Tesaṃ panetaṃ ayuttameva
anya-e0601n:679_2: asundarameva. Kasmā, pāḷiyā ca aṭṭhakathāṭīkāvacanehi ca viruddhattā ca tassā gāthāya
anya-e0601n:679_3: atthaggahaṇassa micchattā ca. Imāya hi pāḷiyā gāthāya vā aññānantacakkavāḷesu aññe
anya-e0601n:679_4: buddhā uppajjantīti atthe gayhamāne aṭṭhakathāsu imesu pana tīsu khettesu ṭhapetvā
anya-e0601n:679_5: imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi, na uppajjantīti
anya-e0601n:679_6: pana atthīti vuttavacanena ca, tīṇi hi piṭakāni…pe… imā tisso saṃgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake
anya-e0601n:679_7: buddhavacane…pe… suttaṃ natthi. Na uppajjantīti pana atthīti vuttavacanena ca ujukaṃ
anya-e0601n:679_8: virujjhati ca. Bhaddantamahā buddhaghosādayo aṭṭhakathācariyā taṃ pāḷiṃ na passantīti
anya-e0601n:679_9: attano duggahitena aṭṭhakathācariyānaṃ abbhakkhānaṃ āpajjati ca. Kiṃ panete tipiṭakadharā
anya-e0601n:679_10: tikkhavisadajavana gambhīrādiñāṇikā aṭṭhakathācariyā na passeyyuṃ. Passeyyuṃ eva.
anya-e0601n:679_11: Tasmā ayuttameva. Aṭṭhakathāsu pana āgataṃ suttaṃ natthītiādivacanameva yuttataraṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0601n:680_0: Ettha ca buddhakkhettetipadaṃ tasmiñca disābhāgamhītipade visesanaṃ, asaṅkhayātipadaṃ
anya-e0601n:680_1: dutiyagāthāya pabhātipadassa visesananti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ayaṃ panettha yojanā. Loke cakkavāḷaloke
anya-e0601n:680_2: dasavidhā dasa koṭṭhāsā disā honti. Tattha koṭṭhāse yāyato yāyantassa gacchantassa
anya-e0601n:680_3: me antakaṃ pariyosānaṃ natthi. Buddhakkhette buddhassa dasasahassisaṅkhātajātikkhettabhūte
anya-e0601n:680_4: tasmiñca disābhāgamhi mayhaṃ asaṅkhayā saṅkhārahitā yamakā yugaḷā yugaḷā hutvā raṃsivāhanā
anya-e0601n:680_5: raṃsivahantā raṃsimuñcamānā vā pabhā cakkaratanamaṇiratanādīnaṃ ālokā pakittitā pākaṭā
anya-e0601n:680_6: pattharitā vā. Etthantare dasasahassacakkavāḷantare raṃsijālaṃ raṃsisamūhena vipulo
anya-e0601n:680_7: bahutaro āloko bhave ahosinti. Ayamattho cakkindābhisirīsaddhamma dhajamahādhammarājādhirājagurūtiladdhalañchitena
anya-e0601n:681_0: Bhagavā hi imāhi gāthāhi cakkavattirājakāle mayhaṃcakkaratanamaṇīratanādīnaṃ asaṅkhayā
anya-e0601n:681_1: pabhā buddhakkhettabhūte dasasahassicakkavāḷe pākaṭā pattharitāti dasseti. Na anantacakkavāḷesu
anya-e0601n:682_0: Vuttañhetaṃ buddhaapadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “disā dasavidhā loketi cakkavāḷaloke dasavidhā
anya-e0601n:682_1: dasakoṭṭhāsā disā honti. Tattha koṭṭhāse yāyato yāyantassa gacchantassa antakaṃ natthīti
anya-e0601n:682_2: attho. Cakkavattikāle tasmiṃ mayā gataṭṭhāne disābhāge vā buddhakkhette buddhavisayā
anya-e0601n:682_3: asaṅkhayā saṅkhārahitā. Pabhā pakittitāti tadā cakkavatti rājakāle mayhaṃ pabhā cakkaratanamaṇiratanādīnaṃ
anya-e0601n:682_4: pabhā ālokā yamakā yugaḷā yugaḷā hutvā raṃsivāhanā raṃsimuñcamānā pakittitā pākaṭā.
anya-e0601n:682_5: Etthantare dasasahassacakkavāḷantare raṃsijālaṃ raṃsisamūhaṃ āloko vipulo bahutaro
anya-e0601n:682_6: bhave ahosinti attho”ti. Ettha ca paṭhamagāthāya pubbaḍḍhassa ekavākyabhāvato disā
anya-e0601n:682_7: dasavidhā loketi cakkavāḷaloke…pe… antakaṃ natthīti atthoti vuttaṃ. Aparaḍḍhassa
anya-e0601n:682_8: dutiyagāthāyaṃ antogadhattā cakkavattikāle…pe… asaṅkhayā saṅkhārahitā pabhā pakittitāti
anya-e0601n:682_9: tadā cakkavattikāle…pe… bhave ahosinti atthoti vuttaṃ. Tasmā asaṅkhayātipadaṃ dutiyagāthāya
anya-e0601n:683: Jinālaṅkāraṭīkāyaṃ pana evamassa sabbadhammesu appaṭihata ñāṇācāraṃ dassetvā idāni loke tādisassa aññassa abhāvaṃ dassento āha.
anya-e0601n:686_0: Tattha anantalokadhātūsu ekekissaṃ lokadhātuyā anantasattesu tena tathāgatena samo
anya-e0601n:686_1: ekopi natthi. Sace eko pana samo na bhaveyya. Sabbe sattā ekajjhaṃ hutvā samā bhaveyyunti
anya-e0601n:686_2: ce. Tathāpi natthi, sabbe ekajjhaṃ hutvāpi iminā ekakena samā na hontīti adhippāyoti
anya-e0601n:686_3: vuttaṃ. Ettha ca anantalokadhātusūtiādinā ito cakkavāḷato aññesu anantacakkavāḷesu
anya-e0601n:686_4: aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ abhāvaṃ dasseti. Evaṃ pana mayā pathavojaṃ uddharitvā dassito viya
anya-e0601n:686_5: dassitehi atidaḷhatarehi sādhakavacanehi ito cakkavāḷato aññacakkavāḷesu buddhā uppajjantīti
anya-e0601n:686_6: micchāvādo sūriyo andhakāraṃ paṭihanati viya paṭihaniyati apaniyatīti saddhahakaṃ daṭṭhabboti.
anya-e0601n:687_0: Munindakkoti muninda akkoti padacchedo. Buddhādiccoti attho. Sabbadhamme manati jānātīti
anya-e0601n:687_1: muni. Manadhātu ñāṇe i. Makāre assuttaṃ. Atha vā munāti sabbadhamme saka sāmaññalakkhaṇādinā
anya-e0601n:687_2: paṭivijjhatīti muni. Munati hitāhitaṃ paricchindatīti vā muni, bhagavā. Munadhātu
anya-e0601n:687_3: paṭivijjhane, catusaccadhamme munāti jānātīti vā monaṃ. Catumaggañāṇaṃ. Vuttañhi
anya-e0601n:687_4: saṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “monanti catumaggañāṇaṃ. Tañhi munātīti monaṃ, catusaccadhamme
anya-e0601n:687_5: jānātīti attho”ti. Monaṃ assa atthīti muni, bhagavā. Muni ca so indati veneyyasatte
anya-e0601n:687_6: dhammena abhibhavati indo cāti munindo, bhagavā. Atha vā munīnaṃ pañcamunīnaṃ indoti
anya-e0601n:687_7: munindo, bhagavā. Na kamati na gacchati pādena attano puññajavimānena gacchatīti
anya-e0601n:687_8: akko, ādicco. Napubba kamudhātu gatiyaṃ kvi. Dhātvantalopo. Kassa dvittaṃ. Atha vā
anya-e0601n:687_9: yugandharubbedhappamāṇe ākāse arati gacchatīti akko. Aradhātu gamane kapaccayo. Kassa
anya-e0601n:687_10: dvittaṃ. Taṃ taṃ rāsito taṃ taṃ rāsiṃ arati yātīti vā akko. Atha vā mahantajutatāya
anya-e0601n:687_11: akkiyati abhitthaviyati tappasannehi janehīti akko, ādicco. Akkadhātu thavane a.
anya-e0601n:687_12: Munindo ca so akko cāti munindakko, akko ādicco viya vā munindoti munindakko, buddho.
anya-e0601n:687_13: Yathā hi sūriyo attano sahassaraṃsiyā ekacakkavāḷe timirandhakāraṃ vidhametvā dine
anya-e0601n:687_14: dine navayojanasatasahassappadesaṃ koṭisahassappadesaṃ vā dasadisaṃ vā obhāsetvā
anya-e0601n:687_15: virocamāno carati, evameva bhagavāpi attano saddhammaraṃ siyā buddhakkhettabhūtesu
anya-e0601n:687_16: dasasahassacakkavāḷesu vineyyānaṃ avijjandhakāraṃ vidhametvā dine dine tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
anya-e0601n:687_17: disābhāge veneyyasattasamūhaṃ catusaccadhammobhāsena jotayamāno virocanaṃ caratīti
anya-e0601n:687_18: ṭhānānurūpaṃ munindakkoti thometi. Ayaṃ samāsopamā hīnūpamāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:688_0: Suddheti rāgādimalehi visuddhe. Sujjhati visujjhatīti suddho, tibhavo. Sudhadhātu
anya-e0601n:688_1: soceyyeti. Tibhava kuhareti tibhavasaṅkhātakamalasare. Kamalasaraṃ viya tibhavasmiṃ
anya-e0601n:688_2: vā bhavanti sattā etthāti bhavo. Bhūdhātu sattāyaṃ ṇa. Tayo bhavā tibhavā, kāmarūpārūpabhūmi
anya-e0601n:688_3: labbhati. Kuṃ vuccati udakaṃ, taṃ haratīti kuharo. Kupubbaharadhātu haraṇe a. Tayo
anya-e0601n:688_4: bhavā ca te kuharo cāti tibhavakuharo, kuharo viya tayo bhavāti vā tathā. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0601n:688_5: tibhavakuhare. Kamala kathitanti uppalanti kathetabbaṃ kaṃ jalaṃ alayati vibhūsayatīti
anya-e0601n:688_6: kamalaṃ, uppalaṃ. Kaṃsaddūpapada aladhātu vibhūsane a. Atha vā kamiyati icchiyatīti
anya-e0601n:688_7: kamalaṃ. Kamudhātu icchāyaṃ alapaccayo. Kamalanti uppalanti kathiyatīti kamalakathitaṃ.
anya-e0601n:688_9: Vinetabbo dametabbo satthārāti vineyyo, satto. Vipubbanidhātu damane ṇyo. Paṇanti
anya-e0601n:688_10: jīvanti sattā anenāti pāṇaṃ, jīvitindriyaṃ. Paṇadhātu jīvāyaṃ ṇa. Taṃ assa atthi
anya-e0601n:688_11: tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti pāṇo, satto. Assatthitaddhite ṇapaccayo. Vineyyo ca so pāṇo cāti
anya-e0601n:688_12: vineyyappāṇo. Avayavena saha hanati gacchati pavattatīti ogho, samūho. Avapubba hanadhātu
anya-e0601n:688_13: gatiyaṃ ṇo. Avassa o. Hanassa gho. Vineyyappāṇānaṃ ogho samūhoti vineyyappāṇogho, taṃ.
anya-e0601n:689_0: Dhammaraṃsivarehīti uttamadhammasaṅkhātaraṃsīhi. Ettha ca dhammoti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0601n:689_1: paṭipajjamāne satte catūsu apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo.
anya-e0601n:689_2: Dharadhātu dhāraṇe rammapaccayo. Dhāreti ca apāyādinibbattakakilesaṃ viddhaṃsetīti
anya-e0601n:689_3: attho. Caturiyamaggo ca nibbānañca nippariyāyato labbhati. Kasmā, ariyamaggassa kilesānaṃ
anya-e0601n:689_4: samucchedappahānavasena samucchedakattā, nibbānassa ca nissaraṇappahānavasena tassa
anya-e0601n:689_5: ārammaṇabhāvaṃ patvā tadatthasiddhihetuttā. Caturiyaphalañca pariyattidhammo ca pariyāyato
anya-e0601n:689_6: labbhati. Kasmā, phalassa maggena viddhaṃsi tabbānaṃ kilesānaṃ paṭippassambhanappahānavasena
anya-e0601n:689_7: maggānukūlappa vattattā. Pariyattidhammassa ca tadaṅgappahānavasena tadadhigama hetuttā.
anya-e0601n:689_8: Atha vā kilese dhunāti kampati calati viddhaṃsetīti dhammo, caturiyamaggo. Dhunadhātu
anya-e0601n:689_9: kampane rammo. Ariyehi dhāriyati paṭivijjhiyati sacchikariyati ārammaṇa karaṇavasenāti
anya-e0601n:689_10: dhammo, nibbānaṃ. Dharadhātu ñāṇe. Dhaṃseti paṭippassambheti maggappahīnakilesavāsananti
anya-e0601n:689_11: dhammo, ariyaphalaṃ. Dhaṃsadhātu viddhaṃsane. Attano sabhāvaṃ dhāreti ca dhāriyati
anya-e0601n:689_12: ca paṇḍitehi na bālehīti dhammo, pariyattidhammo. Dhammo ca dhammo ca dhammo ca dhammo
anya-e0601n:689_13: cāti dhammo eka sesanayena, dasavidho dhammo labbhati. Vuttañhetaṃ chattavimāne –
anya-e0601n:694_0: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā. Māṇava rāgavirāgaṃ rāgavigataṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ maggadhammañca
anya-e0601n:694_1: anejaṃ ejāsaṅkhātataṇhāvirahitaṃ asokaṃ sokavirahitaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ phaladhammañca,
anya-e0601n:694_2: asaṅkhataṃ saṅkhatavirahitaṃ imaṃ dhammaṃ nibbānadhammañca. Appaṭikūlaṃ avirodhanaṃ
