anya-e0601n:841: Loke tasmā vibhāvī vividhahitasukhaṃ sādhavo patthayantā;
anya-e0601n:842: Iṭṭhaṃ atthaṃ vahantaṃ suranaramahitaṃ nibbhayaṃ dakkhiṇeyyaṃ,
anya-e0601n:843: Lokānaṃ nandivaḍḍhaṃ dasabalamasamaṃ taṃ namassantu niccaṃ.
anya-e0601n:844_0: 26. Evaṃ sugatantiādīhi pañcavīsativandanagāthāhi buddhassa paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni tassa
anya-e0601n:844_1: vandane uyyojanaṃ karonto āha buddho buddhotighoso tyādigāthaṃ. Ayaṃ pana saddharāgāthāti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0601n:845_0: Tattha pana loke buddho buddhoti ghoso atidulabhataro buddhabhāvo kā kathāti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:845_1: Ettha ca loketi manussaloke tiloke vā anantacakkavāḷa loke vā. Buddho buddhotighosoti
anya-e0601n:845_2: buddho buddho iti kittisaddo thutisaddo vā. Ghusanaṃ ghoso. Ghusiyati kathiyatīti
anya-e0601n:845_3: vā ghoso, kittisaddo. Ghusadhātu sadde ṇa. Atha vā ghusiyati thaviyatīti ghoso, thutisaddo.
anya-e0601n:845_4: Tena vuttaṃ pārājikaṇḍaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kittisaddoti kittieva. Thutighoso vā”ti. Buddho
anya-e0601n:845_5: buddho iti pavatto ghoso thutighosoti buddhobuddhotighoso. Atidulabhataroti ativiya
anya-e0601n:845_6: dullabhatamo. Dullabhataroti hi vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ lakāralopena dulabhataroti
anya-e0601n:845_7: vuttaṃ. Dukkhena labhiyatīti dullabho. Dupubbalabhadhātu labhane a. Atha vā labhassa
anya-e0601n:845_8: asamiddhanti dullabho, dubbhijāneyya abyayībhāvasamāsoyaṃ. Dusaddo asamiddhattho,
anya-e0601n:845_9: yathā dubbhikkhoti. Ati viya dullabhoti atidulabho. Tesaṃ visesena atidullabhoti
anya-e0601n:845_10: atidulabhataro. Buddhā hi loke kadāci karahaci uppajjanti. Tasmā buddho buddhoti
anya-e0601n:845_11: ghoso atidulabhataroti vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ cūḷavaggakhandhake “ghosopi kho eso gahapati
anya-e0601n:845_12: dullabho lokasmiṃ, yadidaṃ buddho buddho”ti. Yathā ca hi loke udumbarikapupphaṃ dullabhaṃ.
anya-e0601n:845_13: Candamhi sasakaṃ hatthena gaṇhituṃ. Vāyasānaṃ khīraṃ, evaṃ buddhabhāvo atidullabhataroti
anya-e0601n:845_14: vuttaṃ hoti. Ayaṃ pana hīnūpamāti daṭṭhabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ apadānapāḷiyaṃ –
anya-e0601n:847: Vāyasānaṃ yathā khīraṃ, dullabhaṃ lokanāyaka”nti ca;
anya-e0601n:849_0: Kiñcāpi hi loke cakkavattirājūnaṃ uppajjamāno dullabho. Ekasmimpi pana kappe cakkavattirājāno
anya-e0601n:849_1: anekā uppajjanti. Tathāgatā pana loke uppajjamānāpi ekasmiṃ kappe eka dviti catu
anya-e0601n:849_2: pañca buddhāyeva uppajjanti, na taduttari. Yasmā hi asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe tathāgatasuñño
anya-e0601n:849_3: hoti. Tasmā tathāgatasseva kadāci karahaci uppajjanato buddhobuddhotighoso atidulabhataro
anya-e0601n:849_4: kā kathā buddhabhāvoti vutto. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā mahāparinibbānasamaye “devatā
anya-e0601n:849_5: ānanda ujjhāyanti. Durāvatamhā āgatā tathāgataṃ dassanāya kadāci karahaci tathāgatā
anya-e0601n:849_6: loke uppajjanti arahanto sammāsambuddhā. Ajja rattiyā paccūsasamaye tathāgatassa
anya-e0601n:849_7: parinibbānaṃ bhavissati. Ayañca mahesakkho bhikkhu bhagavato purato ṭhito ovārento
anya-e0601n:849_8: otarento vā na mayaṃ labhāma pacchime kāle tathāgataṃ dassanāyā”ti.
anya-e0601n:850_0: Buddhabhāvoti buddhassa bhāvo. Kā kathāti kiṃ vattabboevāti attho. Kasmā pana buddho
anya-e0601n:850_1: atidullabhataroti ca, buddho kadāci karahaci uppajjantīti ca vuttaṃ. Nanu buddhā
anya-e0601n:850_2: loke anekā uppajjantīti. Saccametaṃ. Buddho nāma pana anekāsaṅkhyeyyavārena vā anekāsaṅkhyeyyadivasamāsasaṃvaccharaṃ
anya-e0601n:850_3: vā anekāsaṅkhyeyyakappaṃ vā dasapāramiyo ca pañcamahāpariccāge ca pūretvāva bhavituṃ
anya-e0601n:850_4: sakkoti, na ekekavārādinā. Atha kho pana antamaso kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri
anya-e0601n:850_5: asaṅkhyeyyāni dasapāramiyo ca pañca mahāpariccāge ca pūretvāva buddho bhavituṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0601n:850_6: Tasmā buddho atidullabhataroti ca, buddhā kadāci karahaci uppajjantīti ca vuttanti.
anya-e0601n:851: Evaṃ buddhassa atidullabhatarattā ca kadāci karahaci uppannattā caeva buddhobuddhoti kittayantassa mahapphalaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ apadāne –
anya-e0601n:853: Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassā”ti.
anya-e0601n:854_0: Tasmāti yasmā buddho buddhoti ghoso atidullabhataro, buddhabhāvo kā kathā. Tasmā.
anya-e0601n:854_1: Vibhāvīti medhāvī. Te hi hitāhitaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ vā visesena bhāveti pakāsetīti vibhāvā,
anya-e0601n:854_2: paññā. Vipubba bhūdhātu sattāyaṃ ṇa. Sā etesaṃ atthīti vibhāvīti vuccanti, sādhavo
anya-e0601n:854_3: labbhati. Taṃ pana sādhavoti pade visesanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:855_0: Vividhahitasukhanti nānappakāraṃ lokiyalokuttara saṅkhātaṃ hitasukhaṃ. Tassa pana
anya-e0601n:855_1: attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Taṃ pana patthayantātipade kammaṃ. Sādhavoti sappurisā. Te
anya-e0601n:855_2: hi saparahitaṃ sādheti nibbattetīti sādhavoti vuccati. Sādhadhātu saṃsiddhiyaṃ avo.
anya-e0601n:855_3: Tassa pana padassa namassantūti padena kattubhāvena sambandho. Patthayantāti yācantā.
anya-e0601n:855_4: Vividhahitasukhaṃ patthayanti yācantīti patthayantā, sādhavo. Patthadhātu yācane
anya-e0601n:855_5: anto. Yakārāgamo. Taṃ pana sādhavotipade visesanaṃ. Iṭṭhanti kāmayamānaṃ. Icchitabbaṃ
anya-e0601n:855_6: kamitabbanti iṭṭhaṃ. Isudhātu icchā kantīsu tapaccayo. Tassa raṭṭho, dhātvantalopo.
anya-e0601n:855_7: Atthanti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādiatthaṃ. Atthiyati patthiyatīti attho, vipākānisaṃsaphalaṃ.
anya-e0601n:855_8: Atthadhātu yācanāyaṃ a. Atha vā asati bhavati phalabhāvenāti attho. Asadhātu bhuvimhi
anya-e0601n:855_9: tha. Taṃ pana padadvayaṃ vahantantipade kammaṃ. Vahantanti dhārakaṃ. Vahati haratīti
anya-e0601n:855_10: vahanto, buddho. Vahadhātu vahane pāpuṇane vā anto. Buddho hi sattānaṃ lokiyalokuttarahitasukhaṃ
anya-e0601n:856_0: Suranaramahitanti devehi ca manussehi ca catupaccayādīhi pūjitaṃ. Idaṃ panettha nibbacanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:856_1: Issariyakīḷādīhi suranti dibbantīti surā, devā. Suradhātu dittiyaṃ. Atha vā suranti
anya-e0601n:856_2: īsanti devissariyaṃ pāpuṇanti virocanti cāti surā, devā. Sundarā rā vācā etesanti
anya-e0601n:856_3: vā surā, devā. Khandhasantānaṃ naranti nentīti narā, manussā. Naradhātu nayane a.
anya-e0601n:856_4: Surā ca narā ca suranarā. Tehi mahitabbā pūjitabbāti suranaramahito, buddho. Mahadhātu
anya-e0601n:856_5: pūjāyaṃ ta. Taṃ suranaramahitaṃ. Nibbhayanti abhayaṃ. Bhiyate bhayaṃ. Natthi bhayaṃ
anya-e0601n:856_6: etassāti nibbhayo, buddho. Taṃ nibbhayaṃ. Tathāgatassa aṭṭhasu parisāsu kenaci kāraṇena
anya-e0601n:857_0: Dakkhiṇeyyanti paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbauttamadānārahaṃ. Dātabbāti dakkhiṇā, deyyadhammavatthu.
anya-e0601n:857_1: Dādhātu dānekkhiṇapaccayo. Atha vā dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti etāya sattā yathādhippetāhi
anya-e0601n:857_2: sampattīhīti dakkhiṇā, paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbadānaṃ. Dakkhadhātu vaḍḍhaneyu,
anya-e0601n:857_3: taṃ arahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo, buddho. Arahatitaddhite ṇeyyo. Atha vā dakkhiṇāya hitaṃ
anya-e0601n:857_4: anurūpaṃ mahapphalakaraṇatāya visodhetīti dakkhiṇeyyo, buddho. Visodhetitaddhitāyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:857_5: Buddhoyeva hi dakkhiṇāya mahapphalakaraṇavasena ca, visodhanavasena ca, devasakkabrahmehi
anya-e0601n:857_6: ca, kosalarājādīhi ca, anāthapiṇḍikaseṭṭhādīhi ca paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbaṃ uttamadānaṃ
anya-e0601n:858_0: Lokānanti sattalokānaṃ. Tassa pana attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Nandivaḍḍhanti pītiyā
anya-e0601n:858_1: vaḍḍhāpentaṃ. Nandiyate nandi. Bhāvasādhanoyaṃ. Nandadhātu samiddhiyaṃ nandane vā
anya-e0601n:858_2: i. Pītiyā adhivacanametaṃ. Sā vaḍḍheti buddhetīti nandivaḍḍho, buddho. Nandisaddūpapadavaḍḍhadhātu
anya-e0601n:858_4: ca sabbaññutañāṇādiguṇasampannena dhammadesanāya ca loke sabbasattānaṃ pītiṃ vaḍḍhetīti
anya-e0601n:858_5: attho. Sabbasattānañhi buddhadassane dhammasavane ca titto natthi, tasmā lokānaṃ
anya-e0601n:858_6: nandivaḍḍhanti thometi. Vuttañhetaṃ apadānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “pakatiyāeva hi buddhadassane
anya-e0601n:858_7: puṇṇacandasamuddarājadassane atitto lokoti. Kathaṃ pana sabbasattānaṃ buddhadassane
anya-e0601n:858_8: atitto hotī”ti. Buddhassa pana bāttiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇādīhi sīlādiasādhāraṇaguṇehi
anya-e0601n:858_9: ca adhika sampanno hutvā sabbadevamanussehi ativirocamānattā. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā tāvatiṃse –
anya-e0601n:861_0: Dasabalanti aññehi paccekabuddhāriyasāvakehi asādhāraṇena dasakāyabalena ca dasañāṇabalena
anya-e0601n:861_1: sampannaṃ. Tañhi kehici viruddhehi kāraṇehi balanti na kampentīti balanti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:861_2: Atha vā balanti jīvitaṃ kappenti etenāti balaṃ, kāyabalaṃ. Baladhātu pāṇe a. Balanti
anya-e0601n:861_3: bhāraṃ vahituṃ sakkuṇantīti vā balaṃ, balanti jānanti sabbadhammanti balaṃ, ñāṇa
anya-e0601n:861_4: balaṃ. Dasabalañca dasabalañca dasabalāni ekasesanayena. Tāni yassa soti dasabalo,
anya-e0601n:861_5: buddho. Idha pana sāmaññavasena vuttopi visesaṭṭhāniyattā bhagavato dasakāyabalāni
anya-e0601n:861_6: ca, dasañāṇabalāni ca adhippetāni. Tesaṃ pana sarū patthaṃ nayanasubhagakāyaṅgantyādi
anya-e0601n:862_0: Asamanti sīlādiguṇehi kenaci asadisaṃ. Natthi samo sadiso puggalo etassāti asamo,
anya-e0601n:862_1: buddho. Taṃ asamaṃ. Tanti tādisaṃ guṇasampannaṃ buddhaṃ. Niccanti satataṃ samitaṃ
anya-e0601n:863_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Loke tiloke manussaloke vā, buddhobuddhotighoso buddho
anya-e0601n:863_1: buddhoiti kittisaddo thutisaddo vā, atidulabhataro ativiya dullabhatamo, buddhabhāvo
anya-e0601n:863_2: buddhassa bhāvo, kā kathā kiṃvattabbo eva, tasmā buddhobuddhoti ghosassa atidullabhatarattā,
anya-e0601n:863_3: vibhāvī medhāvī vividhahitasukhaṃ nānappakāraṃ lokiyalokuttarasaṅkhātaṃ hitasukhaṃ
anya-e0601n:863_4: patthayantā yācantā, sādhavo sappurisā iṭṭhaṃ kāmayamānaṃ, atthaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikādiatthaṃ,
anya-e0601n:863_5: vahantaṃ dhārakaṃ, suranaramahitaṃ devamanussehi pūjitaṃ, nibbhayaṃ abhayaṃ asantāsaṃ
anya-e0601n:863_6: vā, dakkhiṇeyyaṃ paralokaṃ saddahitvā dātabbauttamadānārahaṃ, lokānaṃ sattalokānaṃ
anya-e0601n:863_7: nandivaḍḍhaṃ pītiyā vaḍḍhāpanentaṃ. Dasabalaṃ asādhāraṇena dasakāyañāṇabalena sampannaṃ,
anya-e0601n:863_8: asamaṃ sīlādiguṇehi kenaci asadisaṃ taṃ tādisaṃ guṇasampannaṃ buddhaṃ niccaṃ satataṃ
anya-e0601n:866: Puññenetena sohaṃ nipuṇamati sato samparāye ca titto,
anya-e0601n:868: Tikkho sūro dhitatto saparahitadharo dīghajīvī arogo,
anya-e0601n:869: Dhañño vaṇṇo yasassī atibalavadharo kittimā khantupeto.
anya-e0601n:874: Pāsaṃso pemavāco sujanaguṇavidū māmako so bhaveyyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:875_0: 27. Evaṃ buddho buddhoti ghosotyādigāthāya buddhavandane uyyojanaṃ katvā idāni sugatantyādīhi
anya-e0601n:875_1: gāthāhi buddhaṃ vanditvā paṇidhiṃ karonto āha puññenetena sohantyādi gāthādvayaṃ.
anya-e0601n:875_2: Ayaṃ pana gāthādvayampi saddharāgāthāti daṭṭhabbā. Tattha paṭhamagāthāyaṃ soahaṃ
anya-e0601n:875_3: etena puññena samparāye nipuṇamati ca sato ca…pe… khantupeto ca bhaveyyanti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:875_4: Sohanti so ahaṃ. Buddhassa namakkāro soahanti attho. Etena puññenāti iminā buddhavandanapuññakammena
anya-e0601n:875_5: attano kārakaṃ pavati sodhetīti puññaṃ. Pudhātu sodhane ṇya. Puññanti ca idha pana
anya-e0601n:875_6: buddhapaṇāmakriyābhinipphādikā kusalacetanā adhippetā. Sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṃ
anya-e0601n:875_10: cāti attho ca veditabbo. Samparāye cāti ettha casaddo aṭṭhānayogo. So ca nipuṇamatityādīsu
anya-e0601n:875_11: padesu yojetabbo. Samparāyeti paraloke. So hi samparāyitabbā upagamitabbā ettha sattehīti
anya-e0601n:875_12: ca, kammakilesavasena sattehi samparāyitabbā pāpuṇitabbāti vā etthāti ca samparāyoti
anya-e0601n:875_13: vuccati. Saṃparipubba ayadhātu hi gatiyaṃ ṇa. Atha vā kammavasena abhimukho sampareti
anya-e0601n:875_14: gacchati pavattatīti samparāyoti vuccati. Saṃpubbaparadhātu gatiyaṃ ṇya. Iti kho
anya-e0601n:875_15: ānanda kusalāni sīlāni anupubbena aggāya parentītiādīsu viya hi curādi gaṇavasena
anya-e0601n:876_0: Nipuṇamatīti saṇhasukhumapaññavā ca. Saṇhasukhumaṃ atthantaraṃ paṭivijjhanasamatthāya
anya-e0601n:876_1: paññāya sampanno ca vā. Ettha ca nipuṇasaddo saṇhasukhumavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko.
anya-e0601n:876_2: Hitāhitaṃ manati jānātīti mati, paññā. Manadhātu ñāṇeti. Nipuṇā saṇhā mati paññā
anya-e0601n:876_3: yassa meti nipuṇamati. Satoti satimā ca. Saratīti sati, saradhātu cintāyanti. Sā
anya-e0601n:876_4: assa me atthīti sato. Tittoti tappano ca. Yathāladdhavatthunā santuṭṭho cāti attho.
anya-e0601n:876_5: Tisanaṃ tappanaṃ titto. Tisadhātu tappane tapaccayo. Sakārassa toādeso. Yathālābha
anya-e0601n:876_6: santoso, yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasanto so cāti tividhena santosena santuṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:877_0: Dakkhoti taṃ taṃ kicce cheko ca kusalo ca vā. So hi kusalakamme aññasmiñca kiccākicce
anya-e0601n:877_1: adandhatāya sīghaṃ gacchatīti dakkho. Dakkhadhātu sīghatthe a. Diṭṭhujjupaññoti diṭṭhiujupaññoti
anya-e0601n:877_2: padacchedo. Uju diṭṭhipaññāya samannāgatoti attho. Kesuci potthakesu diṭṭhijju paññoti
anya-e0601n:877_3: pāṭho. Diṭṭhiujupaññoti padacchedo, soye vattho. Ujūti akuṭilabhāvena bhavatīti uju,
anya-e0601n:877_4: ajjavo. Ujudhātu ajjave kvi. Atha vā arati akuṭilabhāvena pavattatīti uju, avaṅko.
anya-e0601n:877_5: Aradhātu gatiyaṃ jupaccayo. Arissa uādeso. Sammā passatīti diṭṭhi, mati. Disadhātu
anya-e0601n:877_6: passane tapaccayo. Tassa raṭṭhādeso. Dhātvantalopo ca ī ca. Uju ajjavā diṭṭhi mati
anya-e0601n:877_7: diṭṭhuju visesanaparanipātavasena. Pakārena jānāti aniccādivasena avabujjhatīti paññā.
anya-e0601n:877_8: Papubbañādhātu avabodhane a. Ujudiṭṭhi ca ujupaññā ca yassa meti diṭṭhujjupañño,
anya-e0601n:877_9: puggalo. Avikalavīriyoti anūnavīriyo ca paripuṇṇavīriyo cāti attho. Vihīnaṃ karotīti
anya-e0601n:877_10: vikalo. Vipubbakaradhātu karaṇe a. Rassalo. Vīrānaṃ kammaṃ vīriyaṃ. Avikalaṃ anūnaṃ
anya-e0601n:877_11: vīriyaṃ assameti avikalavīriyo. Na sakkā kusīteneva navalokuttaradhammā laddhuṃ,
anya-e0601n:877_12: āraddhavīriyeneva sakkā. Tasmā avikalavīriyoti patthetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:878_0: Bhogavāti bhuñjitabbasampattisukhena sampanno ca. Bhuñjitabboti bhogo, sampatti.
anya-e0601n:878_1: Bhujadhātu pālanabyavaharaṇesu ṇa. Bhogo assa me atthīti bhogavā. Saṃvibhāgīti saṃvibhajanasīlo
anya-e0601n:878_2: ca saṃvibhajanasampanno ca vā, saṃvibhajati sīlenāti saṃvibhāgī. Saṃvibhajanasīloti
anya-e0601n:878_3: vā saṃvibhāgī, saṃvibhajituṃ sīlamassāti vā saṃvibhāgī. Saṃvibhāge sīlamassāti saṃvibhāgī.
anya-e0601n:878_4: Ayaṃ tassīlattho. Saṃvibhajati dhammenāti saṃvibhajanadhammoti vā. Saṃvibhajituṃ
anya-e0601n:878_5: dhammo assāti vā, saṃvibhajane dhammo assāti vā saṃvibhāgī. Ayaṃ taddhammattho. Saṃvibhajanaṃ
anya-e0601n:878_6: sādhukāro assa atthi. Sādhukārinā saṃvibhajatīti vā, saṃvibhajituṃ sādhukārīti vā,
anya-e0601n:878_7: saṃvibhajane sādhukārīti vā saṃvibhāgī. Ayaṃ tassā dhukārattho. Saṃvipubba bhajadhātu
anya-e0601n:878_8: vibhāge ṇa. Jassa go. Atha vā saṃvibhajanaṃ saṃvibhāgo. So me assa atthīti saṃvibhāgī.
anya-e0601n:878_9: Assathyatthe ī. Paresaṃ yācakānaṃ annādidānavatthuṃ niccaṃ pariccajanakārīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:879_0: Tikkhoti tikkhappaññavā ca nisānapaññavā vā. Tijanaṃ nisanaṃ tikkhā, paññā. Tijadhātu
anya-e0601n:879_1: nisāne kha. Jassa ko. Tikkhā paññā me assa atthīti tikkho. Assathyatthe ṇo. Tikkha
anya-e0601n:879_2: paññāya sampanno cāti attho. Paññāya ca sabba kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ seṭṭhattā mūlakāraṇattā
anya-e0601n:879_3: ca tikkhoti patthanaṃ karoti. Vuttañhi milindapañhe –
anya-e0601n:881: Paññāya vimatiṃ hantvā, santiṃ pappoti paṇḍito”ti.
anya-e0601n:882_0: Sūroti catūsu parisāsu aṭṭhasu parisāsu ca vīro ca. Sattivanto nibbhayoti attho.
anya-e0601n:882_1: Sūrayate virayate sūro. Bhāvasādhanoyaṃ. Sūradhātu vikkantiyaṃ vīre vā a. Atha vā
anya-e0601n:882_2: abhiruachambhianutrāsabhāvena sūrati gacchati pavattatīti sūro. Sūradhātu gatiyaṃ
anya-e0601n:882_3: a. Sīho viya parisamajjhe sūravīrasampanno cāti attho. Sāsani kehi pana saddhammavidūhi
anya-e0601n:882_4: sūrasaddassa nibbacanaṃ na dassitaṃ. Kevalaṃ pana sūroti visiṭṭhasūroti atthavivaraṇamattameva
anya-e0601n:882_5: dassitaṃ. Dhitattoti ettha dhita attoti padacchedo. Dhitoti samādhi. Attanti cittaṃ.
anya-e0601n:882_6: Ekaggacittasampanno cāti attho. Dhāti tiṭṭhati ekārammaṇehi dhito, ekārammaṇe sampayuttadhamme
anya-e0601n:882_7: dhāretīti vā dhito, samādhi. Dhādhātu dhāraṇe ta. Ārammaṇaṃ arati jānātīti attaṃ,
anya-e0601n:882_8: cittaṃ. Aradhātu gatiyaṃ ta. Rassa to. Dhito samādhi attaṃ cittaṃ assa meti dhitatto.
anya-e0601n:883_0: Saparahitacaroti attahitaparahitacaro, attano ca parassa ca atthaṃ paṭipannako cāti
anya-e0601n:883_1: attho. Attano ca parassa ca hitaṃ atthaṃ payojanaṃ carati paṭipajjatīti saparahitacaro.
anya-e0601n:883_2: Saparahitasaddūpapada caradhātu caraṇe a. Dīghajīvīti dīghāyuko ca. Dīghena jīvitindriyena
anya-e0601n:883_3: sampanno vā. Dīgho jīvo jīvitaṃ assa meti dīghajīvi. Āyukappampi dīghajīvitasampanno
anya-e0601n:883_4: cāti attho. Arogoti rogaviraho ca ārogyaṃ vā. Rujjati bhañjati aṅgapaccaṅgānīti rogo,
anya-e0601n:883_5: byādhi. Rujadhātu bhaṅge ṇa. Atha vā rujjati hiṃsatīti rogo. Rujadhātu hiṃsāyaṃ ṇa.
anya-e0601n:883_6: Natthi rogo tassa meti arogo, channavutirogānaṃ abhāvo bhaveyyanti attho. Dhaññoti
anya-e0601n:883_8: daṭṭhabbo. Vuttañhi vessantarajātake “dhaññaṃ maṅgala sammata”nti ca. Temiyajātake
anya-e0601n:883_9: “dhaññapuññalakkhaṇasampannaṃ puttaṃ vijāyī”ti ca. Idaṃ pana nibbacanaṃ. Dhananaṃ
anya-e0601n:883_10: sampajjanaṃ dhaññaṃ, sirīpaññāpuññalakkhaṇānaṃ sampannanti attho. Dhanadhātu sampanne.
anya-e0601n:883_11: Dhātūnaṃ anekatthattā ṇyapaccayo. Ṇakārānubandhe lope kate yapaccayena saddhiṃ nakārassa
anya-e0601n:883_12: ñakāraṃ katvā dhaññanti rūpasiddhi veditabbā. Atha vā dhanaṃ sirīpaññā puññalakkhaṇasampadaṃ
anya-e0601n:883_13: assa me atthīti dhañño. Assathyatthe ṇyo.
anya-e0601n:884_0: Vaṇṇoti vaṇṇasampanno ca. Ettha ca vaṇṇo duvidho hoti sarīravaṇṇaguṇavaṇṇavasena.
anya-e0601n:884_1: Tattha sarīra vaṇṇo nāma rūpakāyassa pāsādikarūpasampannatā. Guṇa vaṇṇo nāma sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇena
anya-e0601n:884_2: ca dhutaṅgādipaṭipadāguṇena ca sampannatā. Idaṃ pana nibbacanaṃ. Vaṇṇeti vikāramāpannānaṃ
anya-e0601n:884_3: hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti vaṇṇo, sarīrarūpaṃ. Vaṇṇeti attano dabbaṃ pakāsetīti
anya-e0601n:884_4: vaṇṇo, guṇo. Vaṇṇadhātu pakāsane a. Idha pana tadubhayampi yujjati. Vaṇṇaṃ assa me
anya-e0601n:884_5: atthīti vaṇṇo. Assathyatthe a. Yasassīti parivārasampanno kittivanto vā. Ettha ca
anya-e0601n:884_6: duvidho hoti yaso parivārakittiyasavasena. Tattha yajiyati pūjiyati etena parivārenāti
anya-e0601n:884_7: yaso, parivāro. Yajadhātu pūjāyaṃ a. Jassa so. Atha vā yāti gacchati pāpuṇāti sāmikassa
anya-e0601n:884_8: parivāranti yaso, parivāro. Yādhātu gatiyaṃ sopaccayo. Yajiyati pūjiyati etenāti
anya-e0601n:884_9: yaso, kittisaddo. Yajadhātu devapūjāsaṅgahakaraṇadānadhammesu a. Jassa so. Atha vā
anya-e0601n:884_10: yāti gacchati pāpuṇāti sabbattha byāpananti yaso, kittighoso thutisaddo vā. Yādhātu
anya-e0601n:884_11: gatiyaṃ sopaccayo. Yaso ca yaso ca yaso ekasesanayena. So assa me atthīti yasassī,
anya-e0601n:885_0: Atibalavadharoti atibalavantadhārako ca ativiya kāyabalañāṇabalavantaṃ dhāretīti
anya-e0601n:885_1: atibalavadharo. Ajātasatturājādayo viya pañcahatthi dasahatthibalassa dhāraṇasamattho
anya-e0601n:885_2: ca, sāriputtattherādayo viya ñāṇabalassa dhāraṇasamattho ca bhaveyyanti attho. Kittimāti
anya-e0601n:885_3: kittighosavanto ca. Kittiyate kathiyate guṇanti kitti, thutighoso. Kittadhātu sadde
anya-e0601n:885_4: i. Kittighoso assa me atthīti kittimā. Assathyatthe mantupaccayo. Khantupetoti khantiyā
anya-e0601n:885_5: upeto samupeto samannāgato ca. Khamanaṃ sahanaṃ khanti. Khamudhātu sahane tapaccayo.
anya-e0601n:885_6: Tassanti tāya upeto samupeto samannāgatoti khantupeto. Khantivādatāpaso viya khantupeto
anya-e0601n:885_7: ca bhaveyyanti attho. Khantiyā hi dukkarattā sabbakusala dhammānaṃ padhānattā seṭṭhatapattā
anya-e0601n:885_8: ca khantupetoti patthanaṃ karoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā “khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā”ti
anya-e0601n:885_9: ca. “Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatī”ti ca. “Khantībalaṃ balānīka”nti ca.
anya-e0601n:887: Sabbepi kusalā dhammā, khantyāyattāva vaḍḍhare”ti ca.
anya-e0601n:888_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. Sohaṃ so ahaṃ, etena puññena iminā buddhavandanapuññakammena
anya-e0601n:888_1: samparāye paraloke, nipuṇamati ca saṇhasukhumapaññavā ca, sato satimā ca titto tappano
anya-e0601n:888_2: yathāladdhavatthunā santuṭṭho ca, dakkho taṃtaṃkicce cheko ca, diṭṭhujjupañño ujudiṭṭhi
anya-e0601n:888_3: paññāya sampanno ca avīkalavīriyo anūnavīriyo ca paripuṇṇavīriyo vā, bhogavābhuñjitabbasampattisukhena
anya-e0601n:888_4: sampanno ca saṃvibhāgī saṃvibhajanasīlo ca tikkho tikkhapaññavā ca, sūroti sattivanto
anya-e0601n:888_5: nibbhayo ca, dhitatto samāhita citto ca ekaggacitto vā, saparahitacaro attahita parahitapaṭipannako
anya-e0601n:888_6: ca dīghajīvī dīghāyuko ca arogo rogaviraho ca dhañño sirīpuññapaññālakkhaṇasampanno
anya-e0601n:888_7: ca vaṇṇo vaṇṇasampanno ca yasassī parivārasampanno ca atibalavadharo atibalavantadhārako
anya-e0601n:888_8: ca kittimā kitti ghosavanto ca khantupeto khantiyā upeto samupeto samannāgato ca bhaveyyanti.
anya-e0601n:890_0: 28. Evaṃ puññenetenatyādigāthāya samparāye paṇidhiṃ katvā idāni diṭṭhadhamme patthanaṃ
anya-e0601n:890_1: kattukāmo saddho dātaṅgupeto tyādigāthamāha. Tattha saddhoti kammādi saddahanalakkhaṇāya
anya-e0601n:890_2: saddhāya sampanno ca. Saddahanaṃ saddhā, saddahatīti vā saddhā. Saddahanti sampayuttadhammā
anya-e0601n:890_3: etāyāti saddhā. Saṃpubbadhādhātu dhāraṇe ta. Sā pana kammādīsu saddahanalakkhaṇā.
anya-e0601n:890_4: Okappanalakkhaṇā vā. Pasādarasā. Udakappasādakamaṇi viya. Pakkhandanarasā vā. Oghuttaraṇo
anya-e0601n:890_6: sotāpattiyaṅgapadaṭṭhānā vā. Sā hatthavittabījāni viya daṭṭhabbā. Bhagavatā hi sā
anya-e0601n:890_7: saddhā “saddhāhattho mahānāgo”ti ca. “Saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭha”nti ca. “Saddhābījaṃ
anya-e0601n:890_8: tapo vuṭṭhī”ti ca “saddhāya tarati ogha”nti ca “saddhā bandhati pātheyyaṃ, saddhā
anya-e0601n:890_9: dutiyā purisassa hotī”ti ca, “saddhesiko bhikkhave ariyasāvako”ti ca, “saddhādhana”nti ca.
anya-e0601n:891: “Yesaṃ atthi saddhā buddhe, dhamme ca saṅgharatane;
anya-e0601n:892: Te maṃ ativirocanti, āyunā yasasā siriyā”ti.
anya-e0601n:893_0: Ca. “Saddhaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ samādiyati, uposathakammaṃ karoti, jhānaṃ
anya-e0601n:893_1: uppādeti, vipassanaṃ uppādeti, maggaṃ uppādeti, abhiññaṃ uppādeti, samāpattiṃ uppādetī”ti
anya-e0601n:893_2: ca. “Dullabhā saddhāsampattī”ti ca vuttā. Tasmā saddho ca bhaveyyanti patthanaṃ karoti.
anya-e0601n:894_0: Sā ca pana catubbidhā hoti āgamasaddhā, adhigamasaddhā, okappanasaddhā, pasādasaddhā
anya-e0601n:894_1: cāti. Tattha sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ abhinīhārato āgatattā āgamasaddhā nāma. Ariyasāvakānaṃ
anya-e0601n:894_2: saccapaṭivedhena adhigatattā adhigamasaddhā nāma. Buddho dhammo saṅghoti vutte acalabhāvena
anya-e0601n:894_3: okappanaṃ okappanasaddhā nāma. Buddhādīsu pasāduppattimattā pasādasaddhā nāma. Idha
anya-e0601n:894_4: pana paṇidhānaṭṭhānattā sabbasaddhā adhippetā. Saddhā assa me atthīti saddho. Assathyatthe ṇa.
anya-e0601n:895_0: Dātaṅgupetoti dātassa aṅgāya kāraṇabhūtāya dhanasampattiyā upeto samupeto samannāgato
anya-e0601n:895_1: ca. Dātabbavatthu ca, tappaṭiggāhakapuggalo ca, saddhā cāti tīhi aṅgehi upeto samupeto
anya-e0601n:895_2: samannāgato ca vā. Diyate dātaṃ. Bhāvasādhanoyaṃ. Dādhātu dāne a. Aṅgīyati ñāyati
anya-e0601n:895_3: etenāti aṅgo, dhanasampatti. Dātassa aṅgo dātaṅgo, tena upeto samupeto samannāgatoti
anya-e0601n:895_4: dātaṅgupeto, atha vā diyatīti dātaṃ, dānavatthu. Dātassa aṅgo dātaṅgo, tena upeto
anya-e0601n:895_5: samupeto samannāgatoti dātaṅgupeto, dātabbavatthu ca, tappaṭiggāhaka puggalo ca,
anya-e0601n:895_6: saddhā cāti tīhi aṅgehi sampajjāmīti patthanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti. Vuttañhi itivuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0601n:895_7: “saddhā deyyadhammo paṭiggāhako cāti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samukhībhūtakāleyeva hi dānaṃ sambhavatī”ti.
anya-e0601n:896_0: Paramasiridharoti uttamasirīdhārako ca. Uttamasiriṃ dhāraṇasamattho ca vā. Ettha
anya-e0601n:896_1: ca sirīti paññāpuññasarīrasobhaggasampattīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Katapuññehi seviyatīti
anya-e0601n:896_2: sirī, katapuññe puggale sevati nissayatīti vā sirī, paññāpuññasarīrasobhaggasampatti
anya-e0601n:896_3: labbhati. Sidhātu sevāyaṃ iro ī ca. Paramā uttamā sirī paramasirī, taṃ dhāretīti
anya-e0601n:897_0: Diṭṭhadhammeti paccakkhabhūte attabhāve. Ettha ca diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto
anya-e0601n:897_1: attabhāvo. So hi passitabboti diṭṭho, attabhāvo. Diṭṭho passitabbo dhammo sabhāvo
anya-e0601n:897_2: assāti diṭṭhadhammoti vuccati. Tasmiṃ diṭṭhadhamme. Virattoti kāmaguṇesu vigataratto
anya-e0601n:897_3: ca, rajjanaṃ ratto. Ranjadhātu rāge. Vigato ratto assa meti viratto. Lajjīti pāpahirivanto
anya-e0601n:897_4: ca, pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya lajjāya sampanno ca vā. Atha vā lajjīti hirottappasampanno
anya-e0601n:897_5: ca. Lajjīsaddena hi lakkhaṇāhāranayena ottappampi gahetabbaṃ. Kasmā, kusala lakkhaṇasabhāvena
anya-e0601n:899: Vuttā bhavanti sabbo, sohāro lakkhaṇo nāmā”ti.
anya-e0601n:900_0: Lajjatīti lajjā, hiri. Lajjadhātu hiriyaṃ. Lajjā assa me atthīti lajjā, kāyaduccaritādito
anya-e0601n:900_1: hirottappasamannāgato cāti attho. Kalyāṇamittoti sundaramitta sampanno ca. Kalyāṇasaddo
anya-e0601n:900_2: hi sundaravācako anipphanna pāṭipadiko. Atha vā kalyaṃ hitaṃ aṇayati pāpayatīti kalyāṇo,
anya-e0601n:900_3: sumitto. Kalyasaddūpapadaaṇadhātu gatiyaṃ ṇa. Mijjati sinehatīti mitto, mijjiyati
anya-e0601n:900_4: sinehiyatīti vā mitto, midadhātu sinehe ta. Kalyāṇo mitto assa meti kalyāṇamitto.
anya-e0601n:900_5: Hitadharasumittasampanno ca bhaveyyanti attho. Idha pana saddhāsīlasutacāgavīriyasati
anya-e0601n:900_6: samādhipaññāguṇehi samannāgato kalyāṇamitto adhippeto. Taṃ pana sandhāya bhagavatā siṅgālasutte –
anya-e0601n:901: “Upakāro ca yo mitto, sukhadukkhe ca yo sakhā;
anya-e0601n:902: Atthakkhāyī ca yo mitto, yo ca mittānukampako;
anya-e0601n:903: Etepi mitte cattāro, iti viññāya paṇḍito; Sakkaccaṃ
anya-e0601n:906_0: “Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo. Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no cāṭṭhāne
anya-e0601n:906_1: niyojaye”ti vutto. Iti evarūpassa ca kalyāṇamittassa dullabhattā kalyāṇamittena sampajjāmīti
anya-e0601n:907_0: Abhiratakusaloti dānādipuññakusaladhammesu abhiramaṇo ca. Kucchitaṃ apāyadvāraṃ salanti
anya-e0601n:907_1: saṃvaranti pidahanti sādhavo etenāti kusalaṃ, dānādipuññadhammā. Kupubba saladhātu
anya-e0601n:907_2: saṃvaraṇe a. Tesu abhiatirekaṃ ramatīti abhiratakusalo, kitantasamāsoyaṃ. Kusalābhiratoti
anya-e0601n:907_3: vattabbe chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ padavipariyāyena evaṃ vuttanti. Atha vā abhiatirekaṃ
anya-e0601n:907_4: ramanaṃ abhirato, kusalesu abhirato yassa meti abhiratakusalo, niccaṃ kusalapuññassa
anya-e0601n:908_0: Pañcasīlādirakkhoti pañcasīlādīnaṃ rakkhituṃ samattho ca. Ettha ca ādisaddena gihīnaṃ
anya-e0601n:908_2: saṅgaṇhāti. Pañcasīlaṃ ādi yesaṃ teti pañcasīlādi, taṃ rakkhati rakkhituṃ samatthetīti
anya-e0601n:908_3: pañcasīlādirakkho. Gahaṭṭhānaṃ niccasīlavasena pañcasīlaṃ sati ussāhasamatthe uposathaṅgavasena
anya-e0601n:908_4: aṭṭhaṅgasīlaṃ dasaṅgasīlañca akhaṇḍaṃ acchiddaṃ asabalaṃ akammāsaṃ katvā rakkhituṃ
anya-e0601n:908_6: samattho cāti attho. Bhagavatā hi “sīlavipattihetu vā bhikkhave sattā kāyassa bhedā
anya-e0601n:908_7: paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjantī”ti ca. “Sīlasampadāhetu
anya-e0601n:908_8: vā bhikkhave sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti
anya-e0601n:908_9: ca. “Sīlasampanno mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggacchati.
anya-e0601n:908_10: Catuparisaṃ visārado upasaṅkamati amaṅkubhūto. Asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā
anya-e0601n:908_11: paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjatī”ti ca vuttattā ca. Aṭṭhakathāyañca “sīlālaṅkārasadiso
anya-e0601n:908_12: alaṅkāro natthi, sīlasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthi, sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthī”ti ca.
anya-e0601n:908_13: “Sīla sampattiñhi nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇātī”ti ca. “Ādimhi sīlaṃ visodheyyā”ti
anya-e0601n:908_14: ca. “Sattā sīlena visujjhantī”ti ca. “Sīlaṃ sāsanassa ādī”ti ca. “Sattasu visuddhīsu
anya-e0601n:908_15: sīlavisuddhi sarīraṃ nāmā”ti ca. “Sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:908_16: leṇaṃ gati parāyana”nti ca vuttattā pañcasīlādirakkhoti patthanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:909_0: Appicchoti aniccho ca, rūpādikāmaguṇesu anicchantoti attho. Abhāvatthohettha appasaddo.
anya-e0601n:909_1: Appaḍaṃsamakasavā tātapātiādīsu viya icchanaṃ icchā, rūpādikāmaguṇaṃ icchatīti vā
anya-e0601n:909_2: icchā, kāmataṇhā. Isudhātu icchākantīsu a. Dhātvantassaccho. Natthi icchā yassa meti
anya-e0601n:909_3: appiccho, rūpādīsu kāmesu anicchanto cāti attho. Appiccho pana catubbidho hoti paccayaappiccho,
anya-e0601n:909_4: pariyattiappiccho, dhutaṅgaappiccho, paṭivedhaappiccho cāti. Tattha catūsu paccayesu
anya-e0601n:909_5: appiccho paccayaappiccho. Yo pana paccaye bahuṃ dente appaṃ gaṇhati, appaṃ dente
anya-e0601n:909_6: appataraṃ vā gaṇhati na vā gaṇhati. Na anavasesagāhī hoti. Ayaṃ paccayaappiccho nāma.
anya-e0601n:909_7: Yo pana tepiṭakopi samāno na bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetukāmo hoti, ayaṃ pariyattiappiccho
anya-e0601n:909_8: nāma. Dhutaṅgasamādānassa pana dhutaṅgapariharaṇabhāvaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti,
anya-e0601n:909_9: ayaṃ dhutaṅgaappiccho nāma. Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sotāpannādibhāvaṃ
anya-e0601n:909_10: jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ adhigamaappiccho nāma. Imehi appicchaguṇehi sampanno ca
anya-e0601n:910: Appakodhoti dussanalakkhaṇadosato virahito ca. So hi kujjhatīti kodhoti vuccati. Dosassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Natthi kodho assa meti appakodho.
anya-e0601n:911: Kuddho atthaṃ na jānāti, kuddho dhammaṃ na passati;
anya-e0601n:912: Andhatamaṃ tadā hoti, yaṃ kodho sahate naranti.
anya-e0601n:913: Vuttadesanaṃ manasikaritvā appakodhoti patthanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:914_0: Ativujuhadayoti atieva ujucittasamannāgato ca. Arati gacchati pavattati akuṭilabhāvenāti
anya-e0601n:914_1: uju, ajjavaṃ. Aradhātu gatiyaṃ ju. Arissa u. Ārammaṇaṃ haratīti hadayaṃ, cittaṃ.
anya-e0601n:914_2: Haradhātu haraṇe aya. Rassa do. Atha vā ārammaṇaṃ harantaṃ ayati gacchati pavattatīti
anya-e0601n:914_3: hadayaṃ, cittaṃ. Harasaddūpapada ayadhātu gatiyaṃ a. Uju ca taṃ hadayañcāti ujuhadayaṃ.
anya-e0601n:914_4: Atieva uju hadayaṃ assa meti ativujuhadayo. Gomuttavaṅko ca candalekhāvaṅko ca naṅgalakoṭi
anya-e0601n:914_5: vaṅko cāti tīhi vaṅkehi vigato hutvā ativiya ujucittasamannāgato ca bhaveyyanti attho.
anya-e0601n:914_6: Tattha ca yo pāpaṃ katvāva na karomīti bhāsati. So gantvā paccosakkanatāya gomuttavaṅko
anya-e0601n:914_7: nāma. Yo pāpaṃ karontova bhāyāmahaṃ pāpassāti bhāsati. So yebhuyyena kuṭilatāya candalekhā
anya-e0601n:914_8: vaṅko nāma. Yo pāpaṃ karontova ko pāpassa na bhāyeyyāti bhāsati, so nātikuṭilatāya
anya-e0601n:914_9: naṅgalakoṭivaṅko nāma hoti. Yassa vā tīṇi kammadvārāni asuddhāni. So gomuttavaṅko
anya-e0601n:914_10: nāma hoti. Yassa yāni kānici dve. So candalekhā vaṅko nāma. Yassa yaṃkiñci ekaṃ.
anya-e0601n:915_0: Iddhimāti iddhiyā samannāgato ca, iddhisaddassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Iddhi
anya-e0601n:915_1: assa me atthīti iddhimā. Assathyatthe mantupaccayo. Mānussikāle manussiddhiyā devuppattikāle
anya-e0601n:915_2: deviddhiyā samaṇuppattikāle samaṇiddhiyā ca sampuṇṇeyyanti attho.
anya-e0601n:916_0: Appameyyoti appametabbehi sīlādiguṇehi sampanno ca. Pametabboti pameyyo. Papubbamādhātu
anya-e0601n:916_1: pamāṇe ṇya. Na pameyyo appameyyo, appameyyo sīlādiguṇo me assa atthīti appameyyo.
anya-e0601n:916_2: Assathyatthe ṇa. Appameyyehi sīlādiguṇehi ca bhogasampattīhi ca sampajjāmīti patthanaṃ
anya-e0601n:917_0: Pāsaṃsoti sīlādiguṇehi buddhādisappurisānaṃ pasaṃsāraho ca, pasaṃsiyate thaviyate
anya-e0601n:917_1: pasaṃso. Bhāva sādhanoyaṃ. Papubbasaṃsadhātu thutiyaṃ, taṃ arahatīti pāsaṃso. Arahatitaddhite
anya-e0601n:917_2: ṇa. Buddhādisappurisehi pasaṃsi tabbehi dānasīlādiguṇehi sampanno ca bhaveyyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0601n:918_1: ca. Piyateti pemā, vācā. Pīdhātu tappanakantīsu imo. Vacitabbāti vācā. Vacadhātu
anya-e0601n:918_2: viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ ṇa. Pemā vācā assa meti pema vāco. Buddhādisappurisehi pemiyā
anya-e0601n:918_3: caturaṅgasamannāgata vācāya sampanno cāti attho. Sappurisānaṃ pana vācā caturaṅgasamannāgatā
anya-e0601n:918_4: hoti. Subhāsitavācā ca dhammavācā piyavācā saccavācāti. Tathāhetaṃ vuttaṃ sagāthāvagga saṃyutte –
anya-e0601n:923_0: Ayaṃ panettha yojanā. Santo sappurisā uttamaṃ subhāsitaṃ suṭṭhu bhāsitaṃ vācaṃ āhu,
anya-e0601n:923_1: dhammaṃ bhaṇe bhaṇeyya adhammaṃ na bhaṇe na bhaṇeyya, dutiyaṃ taṃ vācaṃ āhu, piyaṃ
anya-e0601n:923_2: bhaṇe bhaṇeyya, appiyaṃ na bhaṇe na bhaṇeyya, tatiyaṃ taṃ vācaṃ āhu, saccaṃ bhaṇe
anya-e0601n:923_3: bhaṇeyya alikaṃ na bhaṇe na bhaṇeyya, catutthaṃ taṃ vācaṃ āhūti.
anya-e0601n:924_0: Sujanaguṇavidūti buddhādisappurisānaṃ sīlādiguṇaṃ vijānako ca. Sundaro jano sujano.
anya-e0601n:924_1: Guṇati pakāseti sīlādiguṇasamaṅgitaṃ puggalanti guṇaṃ, sīlādiguṇaṃ. Guṇadhātu pakāsane
anya-e0601n:924_2: a. Sujanānaṃ buddhādisappurisānaṃ guṇo sujanaguṇo, taṃ vidati jānātīti sujanaguṇavidū.
anya-e0601n:924_3: Sujana guṇasaddūpapadavidadhātu ñāṇe ū. Buddhādisappurisānaṃ sīlasamādhipaññādiguṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:925_0: Māmakoti buddhādisajjanānaṃ māmako ca. Mamāyatīti māmako. Mamadhātu mānane peme vā
anya-e0601n:925_1: ṇvu. Tassa ako. Buddhādiratanattayañca saddhammañca mānanto ca bhaveyyanti attho.
anya-e0601n:926_0: Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepayojanā. So ahaṃ diṭṭhadhamme paccakkhabhūte attabhāve, saddho
anya-e0601n:926_1: saddhāya samannāgato ca, dātaṅgupeto dātassa aṅgāya kāraṇabhūtāya dhana sampattiyā
anya-e0601n:926_2: upeto samupeto samannāgato ca, dātabba vatthu ca, tappaṭiggāhakapuggalo ca, saddhā
anya-e0601n:926_3: cāti tīhi aṅgehi upeto samupeto samannāgato ca vā, paramasiridharo uttamasirīdhārako
anya-e0601n:926_4: ca, uttamasiriṃ dhāraṇasamattho ca vā, viratto kāmaguṇesu vigataratto ca, lajjī pāpahirivanto
anya-e0601n:926_5: ca, pāpajigucchanalakkhaṇāya lajjāya sampanno ca vā, hirottappasamannāgato ca vā,
anya-e0601n:926_6: kalyāṇamitto sundaramitta sampanno ca, abhiratakusalo dānādipuññakusaladhammesu abhiramaṇo
anya-e0601n:926_7: ca, pañcasīlādirakkho pañcasīlādīni rakkhituṃ samattho ca, appiccho aniccho ca, rūpādikāmaguṇesu
anya-e0601n:926_8: anicchanto ca vā, appakodho dussanalakkhaṇadosato virahito ca, ativujuhadayo atieva
anya-e0601n:926_9: ujucittasamannāgato ca, iddhiyā samannāgato ca, appameyyo appameyyehi sīlādiguṇehi
anya-e0601n:926_10: sampanno ca, pāsaṃso sīlādiguṇehi buddhādisappurisānaṃ pasaṃsāraho ca, pemavāco atthabyañjanamadhuratāya
anya-e0601n:926_11: buddhādisappurisehi pemitabbavācāya sampanno ca, sujanaguṇavidū buddhādisappurisānaṃ
anya-e0601n:926_12: sīlādiguṇaṃ vijānako ca, māmako buddhādisajjanānaṃ māmako ca, buddhādiratanattayañca
anya-e0601n:926_13: saddhammañca mānanto ca vā, bhaveyyaṃ bhavāmīti.
anya-e0601n:943_0: 29. Evaṃ puññenetenatyādi gāthādvayena paṇidhiṃ katvā idāni buddhavandanassa phalānisaṃsaṃ
anya-e0601n:943_1: dassento itthantyādi gāthāpañcakaṃ āha. Taṃ pana mūlācariyehi na vuttaṃ, pacchā pana
anya-e0601n:943_2: hitakāmehi paṇḍitehi pakkhittaṃ gāthāpañcakanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tā pana gāthāyo pathyāvattagāthāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0601n:944_0: Tāsu pana paṭhamagāthāyaṃ itthaṃ asaṅkhaye lakkhaṇadīpite nāthaguṇe sūcakāsu gāthāsu
anya-e0601n:944_1: ekagāthampi yo budho sarateti sambandho. Itthanti iminā sugatantiādinā vuttappakārena.
anya-e0601n:944_2: Asaṅkhayeti ettakā buddhaguṇāti gaṇetuṃ asamatthe. Saṅkhiyate saṅkhayā. Saṅkhiyati
anya-e0601n:944_3: gaṇiyatīti vā saṅkhayā. Sakhidhātu saṅkhyāyaṃ yapaccayo. Atha vā saṅkhituṃ na sakkontīti
anya-e0601n:944_4: asaṅkhayā. Ettakā buddhaguṇā ettakā buddhaguṇāti niravasesato ekabuddhopi anekavassa
anya-e0601n:944_5: satasahassakoṭiyāpi gaṇetuṃ asamatthova. Pageva pana aññeti attho. Vuttampi cetaṃ apadāne –
anya-e0601n:950: Natveva tava sabbaññu, ñāṇaṃ sakkā pametave”ti ca.
anya-e0601n:951_0: Mahāvaggasaṃyuttaṭṭhakathāyañca “appamāṇā hi buddhā tesaṃ buddhāpi anavasesato vaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:951_1: vattuṃ asamatthā, pageva itarā pajā”ti ca. Lakkhaṇadīpiteti upalakkhaṇa nayena pakāsitabbe.
anya-e0601n:951_2: Ettha ca padhānanayo nidassana nayo ca labbhati. Nāthaguṇeti buddhassa sīlasamādhi
anya-e0601n:951_3: paññādiguṇe. Tassa pana padassa vacanattho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Sūcakāsvekagāthampīti
anya-e0601n:951_4: sūcakāsu ekagāthampīti padacchedo. Sūcakāsūti pakāsakāsu. Gāthāsūti sugatantyādinā
anya-e0601n:951_5: vuttāsu chabbīsativandanagāthāsu. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Kavīhi gāyati kathiyatīti
anya-e0601n:951_6: gāthā. Pajjaviseso. Gedhātu sadde tha. Gedhātussa gādeso. Atha vā gaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0601n:951_7: Taṃ tiṭṭhati etthāti gāthā. Gaṃsaddūpapadathādhātu gatinivattiyaṃ. Gaṃ vuccati ñāṇaṃ,
anya-e0601n:951_8: tena kavīhi bandhitvā thiyati thapiyatīti vā gāthā, tāsu gāthāsu. Ekagāthampīti ekapajjampi.
anya-e0601n:951_9: Ettha ca pisaddo garahattho. Tena anekagāthāya buddhaguṇasaraṇe kā kathāvāti sambhāveti.
anya-e0601n:951_10: Budhoti yo paṇḍito. So hi atthānatthaṃ budhati jānātītibudhoti vuccati. Sarateti
anya-e0601n:952_0: 30. Soti so budho bhaveyyāti sambandho. Caturāpāyamuttoti nirayatiracchānapetaasurakāyasaṅkhātehi
anya-e0601n:952_1: catūhi apāyehi vimutto ca. Puññasammatā ayāyebhuyyena apagatoti apāyo. Ayato sukhato
anya-e0601n:952_2: apagatoti vā apāyo. Abyayībhāvasamāsoyaṃ. Atha vā tisso sampattiyo ayanti gacchanti
anya-e0601n:952_3: pavattanti etenāti ayo, puññaṃ. Ayadhātu gatiyaṃ a. Puññato ayati gacchati pavattatīti
anya-e0601n:952_4: vā, puññakārīhi ayitabbo pavattetabboti vā ayo, sukhaṃ. Tato apagatoti apāyo. Caturo
anya-e0601n:952_5: apāyo caturāpāyo, tehi mutto vimuttoti caturāpāyamutto. Sādhakatthadvayassa cāti
anya-e0601n:952_6: sādhako atthadvayassa cāti padacchedo. Atthadvayassāti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikasaṅkhātassa
anya-e0601n:952_7: atthadvayassa. Ettha casaddo aṭṭhānayogo. So pana sādhako tyādīsu padesu yutto. Sādhakoti
anya-e0601n:952_8: nipphādako ca. So hi sādheti nipphādetīti sādhakoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:953_0: Hatūpaddavajālo cāti hato upaddavasaṅkhātajālo ca. Hanayittha apanayitthāti hato.
anya-e0601n:953_1: Hanadhātu hiṃsāyaṃ ta. Upagantvā davati hiṃsatīti upaddavo, jātibhayādi soḷasaupaddavo.
anya-e0601n:953_2: Upapubbadudhātu hiṃsāyaṃ, upaddavā nāma pana soḷasavidhā honti jātibhayaṃ, jarābhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:953_3: byādhibhayaṃ, maraṇabhayaṃ, rājabhayaṃ, corabhayaṃ, aggibhayaṃ, udakabhayaṃ, ūmibhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:953_4: kumbhilabhayaṃ, āvaṭṭabhayaṃ, susukābhayaṃ, attānuvādabhayaṃ, parānuvādabhayaṃ, daṇḍabhayaṃ,
anya-e0601n:953_5: duggatibhayañcāti. Jalati hiṃsati macche etenāti jālaṃ, macchajālaṃ. Jālaṃ viyāti
anya-e0601n:953_6: jālo, upaddavo. Nitatthena pana jalati hiṃsati satte etenāti jālo. Upaddavo. Jaladhātu
anya-e0601n:953_7: hiṃsāyaṃ ṇa. Hato upaddavasaṅkhātajālo yena soti hatūpaddavajālo. Buddhapaṇāmacetanāya
anya-e0601n:953_8: pahito upaddavasaṅkhātajālo bhaveyyāti attho. Lābhī hitasukhassa cāti hitassa ca
anya-e0601n:953_9: sukhassa ca lābhī ca. Labhanaṃ lābho, taṃ assa atthīti lābhī, hinoti vaḍḍhatīti hitaṃ,
anya-e0601n:953_10: atthaṃ. Sukhayatīti sukhaṃ. Yassuppajjati, taṃ sukhitaṃ karotīti attho. Atha vā suṭṭhu
anya-e0601n:953_11: dukkhaṃ khanatīti sukhaṃ. Supubba khanudhātu avadhāraṇe kvi. Hitañca sukhañca hitasukhaṃ,
anya-e0601n:954_0: 31-32. Naradevānaṃ adhipo ca catudīpissaropi vā bhaveyyāti sambandho. Naradevānanti
anya-e0601n:954_1: narā ca devā ca naradevā, tesaṃ. Kammatthe cetaṃ chaṭṭhīvacanaṃ. Adhipoti issaro
anya-e0601n:954_2: ca. So hi attādhīnaṃ pāti rakkhati dhammena vā adhiabhibhavitvā pāti rakkhatīti adhipoti
anya-e0601n:954_3: vuccati. Adhipubbapādhātu rakkhane a, narānaṃ adhipo issaro manussarājā ca devānaṃ
anya-e0601n:954_4: adhipo issaro devarājā ca bhaveyyāti attho. Catudīpissaropi vāti ettha pisaddo sambhāvanatthe
anya-e0601n:954_5: nipāto. Tena pageva ekadīpissararājabhāvo ca, pade sissararājabhāvo cāti sambhāveti.
anya-e0601n:954_6: Vā saddo padapūraṇa mattoyeva. Catudīpissaroti pubbavideho, aparago yāno, jambudīpo,
anya-e0601n:954_7: uttarakuru cāti catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ issaro cakkavattirājāpi bhaveyyāti attho. Tattha
anya-e0601n:954_8: pubbavidehoti sineruno pure bhavaṃ pubbaṃ, vedena paññāya īhanti vāyamanti etthāti
anya-e0601n:954_9: vedeho, vidasaddūpapada īhadhātu vāyāme ṇa. Soyeva videho. Imaṃ dīpamupādāya sineruno
anya-e0601n:954_10: pubbadisabhāgattā pubbo ca so videho cāti pubbavideho, pubbadīpo.
anya-e0601n:955_0: Aparagoyānoti sineruno apare pacchime bhavo aparo. Gavena yanti gacchanti etthāti
anya-e0601n:955_1: goyāno. Gosaddūpapada yādhātu gamane yu. Sineruno pacchima disabhāgattā aparo ca
anya-e0601n:955_2: so goyāno cāti aparagoyāno, pacchimadīpo. Jambudīpoti jāyatīti jambū. Yojanasatubbedho
anya-e0601n:955_3: rukkho. Janadhātu janane ū. Nassa mo. Bakārāgamo. Jalamajjhe dippatīti dīpo, dippanti
anya-e0601n:955_4: jotanti ettha saddhammāti vā dīpo. Dīpadhātu dittiyaṃ a. Tassa pana dviāpoti padacchedaṃ
anya-e0601n:955_5: katvā dvidhā āpo sandati etthāti dīpoti bahubbīhisamāsopi yujjati. Jambuyā lakkhito
anya-e0601n:955_6: paññāto vā dīpo jambudīpo, dakkhiṇadīpo. Uttarakurūti sineruno uttare bhavā uttarā.
anya-e0601n:955_7: Dhammatāsiddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena kaṃ sukhaṃ urumahantaṃ etthāti kuru. Bahubbīhisamāsoyaṃ.
anya-e0601n:955_8: Kuṃ vuccati pāpaṃ. Taṃ rundhanti etthāti vā kuru. Kupubbarudhidhātu āvaraṇe kvi.
anya-e0601n:955_9: Dhātvantassa lopo. Sineruno uttaradisabhāgattā uttaro ca so kuru cāti uttarakuru.
anya-e0601n:955_10: Uttaradīpoti catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ issaro catudīpissaro, cakkavattirājā labbhati.
anya-e0601n:956_0: Evaṃ lokiyahitaṃ dassetvā idāni lokuttarahitaṃ dassento āha antime dehe…pe… subbatoti
anya-e0601n:956_1: antime dehe subbato bhāvanāyānaṃ āruyha aññaṃ taṃ setachattakaṃ dhārento samaṃ essatīti
anya-e0601n:956_2: sambandho. Tattha pana atthakkamena vaṇṇayissāma. Antimeti carime pacchime vā. Ante
anya-e0601n:956_3: pariyosāne bhavo antimo, pacchimasarīro. Tasmiṃ. Deheti sarīre. Dihati upaciyati
anya-e0601n:956_4: vaḍḍhatīti deho, sarīro. Dihadhātu upacaye ṇa. Atha vā dihati upacayati etena puññāpuññanti
anya-e0601n:956_5: deho, pacchimabhavabhūte bhabbakulaputtabhūte vā sarīreti attho. Subbatoti suṭṭhu
anya-e0601n:956_6: paṭipannako hutvā. Suṭṭhu vataṃ paṭipannaṃ assāti subbato. Vakārassabbo. Bhāvanāyānamāruyhāti
anya-e0601n:956_7: bhāvanāyānaṃ āruyhāti padacchedo. Vipassanābhāvanāsaṅkhātayānaṃ āruhitvāti attho.
anya-e0601n:956_8: Bhāvetabbā vaḍḍhetabbāti bhāvanā. Tebhūmaka saṅkhārārammaṇaṃ. Atha vā tadārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0601n:956_9: bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti bhāvanā, vipassanāpaññā. Bhūdhātu sattāyaṃ vaḍḍhane vā yu. Sā
anya-e0601n:956_10: ca samathavipassanā bhāvanāvasena duvidhā hoti. Tattha idha pana aññaṃ setachattakanti
anya-e0601n:956_11: saddantarasanniṭṭhānena vipassanābhāvanā adhippetā. Yanti pāpuṇanti etena nibbānanti
anya-e0601n:956_12: yānaṃ, aniccādivipassanāñāṇaṃ. Yādhātu gatiyaṃ yu. Bhāvanāsaṅkhātaṃ yānaṃ bhāvanāyānaṃ,
anya-e0601n:956_13: bhāvanā ca sā yānañcāti vā bhāvanāyānaṃ.
anya-e0601n:957_0: Āruyhāti ārohitvā. Pakatiyānasadisaṃ anicca dukkhaanattayānaṃ āruhitvāti attho. Aniccādilakkhaṇena
anya-e0601n:957_1: hi vinā maggaphalanibbānaṃ patto nāma natthi. Tasmā bhāvanāyānamāruyhāti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0601n:957_2: Aññanti arahattaphalaṃ. Tañhi paṭhamamaggena ādiṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā catusaccadhammaṃ
anya-e0601n:957_3: avabujjhatīti aññanti vuccati. Āpubbañādhātu avabodhane kvi. Āsaddo mariyādattho.
anya-e0601n:957_4: Setachattakanti odātātapattaṃ. Seviyatīti setaṃ, dhavalaṃ. Sidhātu sevāyaṃ ta. Kilesatapaṃ
anya-e0601n:957_5: chādetīti chattaṃ. Chadadhātu saṃvaraṇe ta. Taṃyeva chattakaṃ. Setañca taṃ chattakañcāti
anya-e0601n:957_6: setachattakaṃ. Arahattaphalaātapattaṃ labbhati. Aññaṃ arahattaphalasaṅkhātaṃ setachattakaṃ
anya-e0601n:957_7: dhārento hutvāti sambandho. Samanti nibbānaṃ. Tañhi sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samati vūpasamati
anya-e0601n:957_8: nirujjhati etthāti samanti vuccati. Essatīti pāpuṇissatīti.
anya-e0601n:958_0: Idāni diṭṭhadhammikatthaṃ dassento imasmiṃ attabhāvepītiādimāha. Tattha imasmiṃ attabhāvepi
anya-e0601n:958_1: arogo ca dīghāyuko ca sabbalokehi pūjito ca bhāvanābhi ratimano ca janappiyo ca manāpo
anya-e0601n:958_2: ca bhaveyyāti yojanā. Attabhāvepīti ettha pisaddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena samparāyikatthaṃ
anya-e0601n:958_3: sampiṇḍeti. Attāti bhavati etena abhidhānaṃ buddhi cāti attabhāvo. Khandhapañcakassetamadhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0601n:958_4: Arogoti sabbabyādhiviraho ca. So hi natthi rogo assāti arogoti vuccati. Dīghajīvikoti
anya-e0601n:958_5: dīghāyuko ca. So hi dīghā jīvi āyu assāti dīghajīvikoti vuccati.
anya-e0601n:959_0: 33. Sabbalokehīti sabbadevamanussehi. Pūjitoti pūjitabbo ca. Bhāvanābhiratimanoti
anya-e0601n:959_1: samathavipassanā saṅkhātāya bhāvanāya abhiramaṇacitto ca. Janappiyoti sabbajanehi
anya-e0601n:959_2: piyāyitabbo ca. Manāpoti sabbasattānaṃ cittavaḍḍhanako ca bhaveyyāti sambandho.
anya-e0601n:960_0: Evaṃ chabbīsatiyā vandanagāthāsu ekagāthāmattampi buddhaguṇānussaraṇe phalānisaṃsaṃ
anya-e0601n:960_1: dassetvā idāni sabbagāthāyo vacasā dhāretvā buddhavandane anekāni phalānisaṃsāni
anya-e0601n:960_2: dassetuṃ kā kathākhiladhāraṇeti āha. Tattha kā kathākhiladhāraṇeti kā kathā akhiladhāraṇeti
anya-e0601n:960_3: padacchedo. Sabbabuddhavandanagāthāya vacasā dhāraṇe kiṃ vattabbā yevāti attho.
anya-e0601n:961_0: Ettha ca akhilasaddo sabbavācako anipphannapāṭipadiko. Atha vā khiyanaṃ khilaṃ. Khidhātu
anya-e0601n:961_1: khaye lapaccayo. Khayaṃ lāti gaṇhātīti vā khilaṃ, appakaṃ. Khayasaddūpapadalādhātu
anya-e0601n:961_2: gahaṇe a. Na khilaṃ akhilaṃ, sabbagāthāyo. Dhāriyate dhāraṇaṃ, akhilāya sabbāya gāthāya
anya-e0601n:961_3: dhāraṇaṃ akhiladhāraṇaṃ, tasmiṃ. Chabbīsatiyā buddhavandanagāthāsu ekaṃ gāthaṃ vacasā
anya-e0601n:961_4: dhārayitvā buddhavandane yathāvuttaphalānisaṃsāni labbhanti, pageva pana sabbabuddhavandanagāthāyo
anya-e0601n:961_5: vacasā dhārayitvā dine dine buddhavandaneti atthoti. Iminā pana gāthāpañcakena yathāvutta
anya-e0601n:961_6: phalānisaṃsaṃ ñatvā saddahako sammādiṭṭhiko kulaputto sabbabuddhavandanagāthāyo vacasā
anya-e0601n:961_7: dhārayitvā rattindivaṃ pubbaṇhakāle ca sāyanhakāle ca rattiyā paṭhamayāme ca pacchimayāme
anya-e0601n:961_8: ca satataṃ samitaṃ nirantaraṃ buddhaṃ vandeyyāti uyyojanaṃ dassetīti.
anya-e0601n:963_0: Iti porāṇācariyehi vanditassa namakkārassa saddatthanayehi chandālaṅkāranayehi ca
anya-e0601n:963_2: cittapasannajanakassa sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye asaṃhira visāradañāṇacārinā sāsanasodhakena
anya-e0601n:965_1: lañchitanāmikena piṭakattayapāḷiṃ silārūḷhaṃ kārayitvā pañcama saṅgītikaraṇena timahādhammarājena
anya-e0601n:965_2: ratanāpuñjanti sammate rājadhānībhūte nānākulasaṃkiṇṇe puññadhaññavantānaṃ sādhūnañca
anya-e0601n:965_4: viya buddhasāsanujjotane mantale nagare iti parikittite mahārāme dese vasantena upāsaka
anya-e0601n:965_5: guṇasampannena nāmikena upāsakena ca tassupaṭṭhākāya nāmikāya upāsikāya ca samakusalacchandaṃ
anya-e0601n:965_6: katvā nibbānassa sacchikaraṇatthāya kārite manorame suvaṇṇena limpitattā suvaṇṇavatī
anya-e0601n:965_7: nāmike dvibhummike mahiṭṭhakavihāre aṭṭhahi disāhi āgatānaṃ sutesanabhikkhūnaṃ sāṭṭhakathaṃ
anya-e0601n:965_8: piṭakattayaṃ dine dine satataṃ nirantaraṃ vācentena adhivasantena sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye
anya-e0601n:965_12: vissutena sāsanasodhaka mahānāyakattheravarena porāṇehi tattha tattha pāḷiyaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0601n:965_13: vuttehi buddhaguṇappakāsakehi buddhaguṇapadehi thomitvā vanditassa atthabyañjanena
anya-e0601n:965_14: chandālaṅkāranayena ca pathavīsandhārakassa udakakkhandhassa viya gambhīrassa pabbatena
anya-e0601n:965_15: paṭicchādetvā ṭhapitassa vatthussa viya atiduddasassa satadhā bhinnassa vālassa aggakoṭiyā
anya-e0601n:965_16: viya atisaṇha sukhumassa puthujjanañāṇena buddhassa duppaṭividhaguṇaparidīpakassa
anya-e0601n:965_17: namakkārassa līnatthappakāsanā buddhaguṇappadīpikanāmikā saṃvaṇṇanā tāsu tāsu aṭṭhakathāṭīkāsu
anya-e0601n:965_18: āgataṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayaṃ nissāya paññāpāṭavatthāya sāsanavuddhiyā ca katā.
anya-e0601n:971: Esā ca saṅkharontena, yaṃ puññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā;
anya-e0601n:975: Sadā rakkhantu rājāno, dhammeneva pajaṃ imaṃ;
anya-e0601n:976: Sabbe sattā sukhī hontu, jotentu jinasāsanaṃ.
